description.hltext_display: Набиуллина: повышение налогов является тупиковым вариантом
Sul coreana viciada em jogos on line acusada de matar o filho
description.content:
SEUL, 22 dez 2010 (AFP) -Uma sul-coreana foi detida pela acusação de ter matado o filho de três anos por estar cansada, depois de ter jogado por várias horas na internet.
Este é o caso mais recente relacionado com o vício em jogos pela internet na Coreia do Sul, um dos países com o maior índice de pessoas com conexão do mundo.
Kim, 27 anos, jogava on-line por 10 horas ao dia, segundo a polícia. Os vizinhos da jovem descreveram a casa como uma "lixeira", onde os filhos da acusada choravam por horas.
A polícia de Cheonan (oeste do país) informou que Kim, que também tem um filho de um ano, agrediu e estrangulou o mais velho, de três anos, por considerar que o menino a atrapalhou ao urinar no chão e chorar.
"Ela disse que se irritou muito com ele porque estava a ponto de descansar depois de ter jogado no computar por quatro horas durante a manhã", afirmou à AFP uma fonte policial.
Kim guardou o corpo da criança dentro de casa por três dias, mas foi denunciada à polícia pelos sogros.
A mulher, segundo a polícia, não tinha antecedentes de trastornos mentais.
O governo sul-coreano calcula o número de viciados em internet em dois milhões, em um país de 50 milhões de habitantes.
Para 2011, as autoridades pretendem entregar softwares gratuitos às pessoas em situação de risco neste campo, para que limitem o tempo que passam na web.
Em novembro, um adolescente de 15 anos cometeu suicídio depois de matar a mãe, que o repreendera pelo tempo que passava no computador.
Em maio, um homem de 41 anos foi condenado a dois anos de prisão depois que ele e a esposa deixaram a filha morrer, vítima de desnutrição, enquanto criavam um "filho virtual" na internet.
Em fevereiro, um homem de 32 anos morreu depois de jogar por quase cinco dias seguidos, quase sem descanso.

description.hltext_display: Man arrested after chase
description.author: Hannah Silverman
description.content:
A GUN-WIELDING man has been arrested in the north eastern suburbs for allegedly holding up a Brahma Lodge chemist following a pursuit through suburban Adelaide. The 33-year-old, of no fixed address, was this morning charged with robbing the business as well as illegal use of a vehicle, house breaking and driving offences to avoid apprehension.
Police are also investigating if he was also involved in the robberies of two other north eastern businesses also on Monday and Tuesday - a Modbury nursing home and a Highbury liquor retailer - which were also held up with a gun on Monday and Tuesday.
Operations Inspector Wayne Overmeyer, of the Holden Hill Criminal Investigations Branch, said police investigations identified the person of interest who was spotted earlier today in a blue Subaru that had been stolen from Port Adelaide that morning. "Police pursued the vehicle through northern, north eastern and western suburbs," Inspector Overmeyer said.
Police were assisted by the Police helicopter, STAR Group officers and dog patrols. "The concern was that we had a male with an alleged firearm in the community that hadn't been apprehended." The man was located in the backyard of a house. "Holden Hill detectives will continue their enquiries into the other robberies as a firearm was used in those offences," Inspector Overmeyer said.
The man will appear in the Holden Hill Magistrates Court tomorrow.
Anyone with information is asked to call Crime Stoppers on 1800 333 000.

description.hltext_display: Fisher impressed with practice
description.author: Ira Schoffel
description.content:
Though they still have four more practices remaining, Florida State coach Jimbo Fisher said Tuesday's practice was similar to what the Seminoles would have done on a Thursday during a regular-season game week.
And if that workout was any indication, FSU's players should be well-prepared for the Dec. 31 Chick-fil-A Bowl against South Carolina.
"That was the best Thursday we've had in a long time ? maybe all year," Fisher said. "They were focused, got their work done ... very pleased with the effort and the focus."
With few exceptions, FSU's players departed Tallahassee on Tuesday and headed home for a brief Christmas break. The team won't meet again until Christmas Day, when it will gather in the Moore Athletics Center and depart for Atlanta.
Some players, mostly Georgia natives who will be spending the holidays close to the bowl site, will have the option of not returning to Tallahassee.
"If they'd have to come through Atlanta ... we'll let them meet us there," Fisher said.
The first practice in Atlanta is scheduled to take place Dec. 26 at Georgia Tech. After two days there, FSU will move preparations to the Georgia Dome.
Rest for Fisher
Though he isn't typically one for rest and relaxation, Fisher said he will take some time to wind down during the holidays.
"Trey wants to go hunting," Fisher said of his oldest son, "so maybe I'll take him out hunting one of the mornings or afternoons. I'll get to spend some time with my kids a little bit."
Not only are most of FSU's players out of town, but the NCAA's recruiting "dead period" has begun. That means college coaches are allowed no personal contact with high-school prospects, and only one phone call per week.
"Still got the phone to work," Fisher laughed.
Noteworthy

description.hltext_display: Burberry Brit for Women - bei Parfumstore erhältlich
description.content:
Drucken 22.12.2010, 08:18 Uhr, Mode & Lifestyle
Ein grün-orientalischer Damenduft, versetzt mit einem leichten Hauch britischer Ironie - Burberry Brit for Women. Als königlicher Hoflieferant gehört Burberry zu einem der ganz großen britischen Luxuslabels, das auch heute noch in seinen Werken immer wieder an alten Traditionen festhält und diese gekonnt in Szene setzt. Mit Burberry Brit for Women kreierte das Label einen modernen und sexy Duft, der sich perfekt in die Riege der Burberry-Düfte einreiht. Eröffnet wird das Parfum mit spritziger Limette, umspielt von geeisten Birnen und knackig, grünen Mandeln. Seine besondere Note erhält Burberry Brit for Women in seinem Herzen, durch Essenzen von zarten weißen Pfingstrosen im Zusammenspiel mit gezuckerten Mandeln. Sinnliche und verführerische Nuancen von Mahagoni, Vanille und Tonkabohnen geben der Basis die besondere Wärme und dem Parfum seine unwiderstehliche Wirkung. Das Eau de Toilette Spray Burberry Brit for Women präsentiert sich in einem transparenten Glasflakon, der geziert wird vom typisch britischen Karomuster, das zum Markenzeichen des Labels Burberry wurde.
Sie erhalten bei uns im Online Parfum-Shop das Eau de Toilette Spray Burberry Brit for Women in den Größen 30 ml und 50 ml sowie das Eau de Parfum Spray Burberry Brit for Women in der Größe 100 ml zu einem günstigen Preis und mit einer versandkostenfreien Lieferung innerhalb Deutschlands.
Im Alter von 21 Jahren eröffnete Firmengründer Thomas Burberry im Jahr 1856 in Basingstoke im englischen Hampshire seinen ersten kleinen Laden für Herrenausstattung. Das innovative und praktische Design seiner Kleidung und auch der Service und die Qualität seiner Arbeit begeisterten seine Kundschaft. Da das Unternehmen seinen Ursprüngen stets treu geblieben ist, gilt es heute weltweit als Luxusmarke. Die Breite des Sortimentes wurde immer wieder erweitert und es werden heute neben Damen - und Herrenoberbekleidung auch verschiedene Accessoires wie z.B. Uhren, Schmuck, Hüte, Schirme, Taschen und Seidentücher bei Burberry hergestellt. Ihre Modetrends ergänzten Sie in den letzten Jahren noch mit der Kreation von Düften, wie Burberry London, Burberry Brit und Burberry The Beat. Die Düfte wurden zu Klassikern und sind aus keiner Luxus - Parfümerie mehr wegzudenken.

description.hltext_display: Prithviraj's next is 'Mumbai Police'
description.content:
Prithviraj will don the uniform again for Roshan Andrew's 'Mumbai Police'. He recently played a police officer, Niranjan IPS, in 'Thriller'.
The latest buzz is that Tamil actor Arya has been roped in for 'Mumbai Police'.
Director Roshan Andrew, who is currently busy with Mohanlal's 'Casanova', will begin work for 'Mumbai Police' from February.

description.hltext_display: drunterwelt überreicht SOUS-Award für besten Newcomer
description.content:
Nachdem das Lingerie-Fachgeschäft drunterwelt im Jahr 2010 selbst den SOUS-Award als bestes Newcomer-Geschäft erhalten hat, ist es dieses Jahr an der Zeit diesen prestigeträchtigen Preis erneut zu verleihen.
Ausgezeichnet wurden Dessous- Geschäfte aus ganz Deutschland. Nun dürfen sich zum 5. Mal die Preisträger über die Auszeichnung freuen.
In Deutschland existieren über 3000 Wäschegeschäfte, wobei in jeder Kategorie 10 Läden nominiert waren.
Nominiert sind erneut 10 Lingerie Fachgeschäfte aus ganz Deutschland. Im Rahmen einer glamourösen Gala wird im Frühjahr 2011 der begehrte Preis verliehen. Conny Taubald, Inhaberin von drunterwelt, wird den Preis am Abend verleihen.
Ausgewählt wird der Preisträger dabei von einer Jury, bestehend aus Vertretern der namhaftesten Marken der Branche. Wie zum Beispiel
Marie Jo, Anita sowie Simone Perele, Calvin Klein, Chantelle oder Hanro.
Neben dem Bereich Newcomer wird der Sous Award noch in weiteren Kategorien vergeben, unter anderem in einem Sonderbereich Engagament. Dabei blohnt das Gremium den besonderen und außergewöhnlichen Einsatz eines Händlers, der ihn von anderen abhebt.
Zusätzlich zu den Händlern werden aber auch die Hersteller geehrt und ausgezeichnet. So können die wichtigsten Produzenten beispielsweise in den Kategorien beste Kollektion oder beste partnerschaftliche Zusammenarbeit einen Preis erhalten. Über diese Auszeichnung entscheiden im Gegenzug die Händler und nicht die Jury.
Jeder Händler ist dazu aufgerufen seine Lieferanten einzustufen um ihnen somit für das vergangene Jahr zu danken.
Der dominierende Händler im vergangenen Jahr war dabei die van de Velde Gruppe mit den Marken Marie Jo, Prima Donna und Andres Sarda. Es bleibt aber abzuwarten ob das belgische Unternehmen ihren Titel, oder zumindest einen von ihnen, zu verteidigen.
Hinweis:
Offenes-Presseportal.de distanziert sich ausdrücklich vom Inhalt dieser Pressemeldung/dieses Artikels. Die Meldung gibt nicht die Meinung von Offenes-Presseportal.de wieder und somit ist Offenes-Presseportal.de nicht für die Richtigkeit des Inhalts haftbar, sondern der Urheber der Pressemeldung/des Artikels. Sollte die obige Meldung Rechte jeglicher Art verletzen, bitte kurze Email schicken an service[at]affective.de, wir löschen diese Meldung dann unverzüglich.

description.hltext_display: Skryt och ett tips till Tomten
description.author: Maria Hansen
description.content:
Lite skryt är på sin plats, mitt lag Bitch 2010 vann nyligen VF:s friskvårdssatsning! Några av er kanske minns att jag fick en pinsam etta (av fem) på konditionstestet som inledde satsningen. Sedan dess har det blivit skivstångspass hit och pilatesbollar dit, och sedan hade vi vinsten som i en liten ask, precis som jag förutspådde i en krönika i våras.
Efter den träningsrika hösten tänker jag med extra gott samvete unna mig att frossa under julen. Hittills har här ba­kats saffransskorpor, gjorts två omgångar kola (den första blev stenhård, den andra för mjuk och sockrig, både åkte i sopen), rischoklad, rocky road och mozartkulor. Mozartkulor med en tvist, till och med. När de väl doppats i mörk choklad insåg jag att det hade varit godare med ljus.
Eftersom en betydande del av godiset skulle ges bort till vänner redan dagen efter, låg jag och grubblade under natten: ge bort äckliga godisar eller gå upp supertidigt och göra nya innan jobbet? Till slut bestämde jag mig för att doppa mozartkulorna i ljus choklad också, för att förhoppningsvis neutralisera den bittra kakaosmaken en aning. Men väl framför spisen på morgonen infann sig den briljanta idén att använda micron för att smälta bort den mörka chokladen, innan kulorna rullades i den ljusa. Behöver det sägas att det hade gått snabbare att göra helt nya?
Mina vänner blev i alla fall glada så det var helt klart värt besväret.
För övrigt blir jag rörd och glad över Röda korsets ungdomsförbunds julfirande på Uno i Karlstad, dit alla som inte vill sitta ensamma hemma är välkomna. Det blir ett hopkok av svenska och utländska traditioner med gemenskap och mat i fokus. Så om julen känns lite ensam, gå dit vettja! Hoppas ni får en god jul, oavsett hur den tillbringas!
(Och om Tomten fortfarande inte vet vad han ska ge mig på fredag är en kökstermometer ett tips. Då kan kulprovet skrotas och kolan kanske inte behöver hamna i soporna nästa jul).

description.hltext_display: Erkennungsmarken, der neue Modetrend – hier auf erkennungsmarken.net eigene Erkennungsmarke zusammenstellen
description.content:
Drucken 21.12.2010, 17:45 Uhr, Mode & Lifestyle
Erkennungsmarken.net richtet sich an Erkennungsmarkenliebhaber in ganz Deutschland. Wer sich dem neuen Modetrend verbunden fühlt, der kommt hier voll und ganz auf seine Kosten. Das besondere an erkennungsmarken.net: Hier muss nicht aus einer vorgefertigten Anzahl an Standardmarken ausgewählt werden, sondern jeder kann sich seine Marke selbst nach eigenen Wünschen kreieren. Schließlich soll die eigene Hundemarke ja auch Individualität symbolisieren und nach Möglichkeit einen kleinen Teil der Persönlichkeit des Trägers widerspiegeln.
Die wichtigsten Informationen im Überblick:
- Die Erkennungsmarke kann sich komplett selbst zusammengestellt werden: Von der Art der Gravur, dem Text über das verwendete Material kann die Marke ganz nach eigenen Vorstellungen gestaltet werden.
- Auch Zubehör wie Ketten können erworben werden
- Viele nützliche Informationen rund um Erkennungsmarken und praktische Tipps zu deren Verwendung
- Einfache und unkomplizierte Onlinebestellung
- Link: www.erkennungsmarken.net
Erkennungsmarken haben sich in den letzten Jahren zu einem bedeutenden Modephänomen entwickelt, das dem aufmerksamen Beobachter nicht entgangen sein dürfte. Überall findet man die glänzenden Marken – meist als Kette um den Hals getragen – und staunt über deren Vielseitigkeit. Der Erfolg der Hundemarken liegt neben ihrer offensichtlichen modischen Anziehungskraft wohl auch in deren Vielseitigkeit. Immerhin kann man die modischen Schmuckstücke beispielsweise als Einladung, als Geschenk mit persönlicher Widmung, als Notfallmarken, als Kofferanhänger und als Schlüsselanhänger verwenden.
Individualität, Übersichtlichkeit und Information
Erkennungsmarken.net überzeugt vor allem mit einem sehr breiten Gestaltungsspektrum, das dem Kunden ermöglicht die Erkennungsmarke ganz nach seinen Wünschen zu gestalten. So ist es sowohl möglich diese selbst zu nutzen oder an geliebte Personen mit persönlicher Widmung weiter zu verschenken. Ob Hochprägung oder Tiefprägung, ob klassischer Edelstahl, versilbert oder ob edles 22 karätiges Gold, erkennungsmarken.net setzt dem eigenen Gestaltungswillen keine Grenzen. Hat man sich für sein Wunschmodell entschieden, dann genügt ein einfacher Klick und schon kann man die glänzenden Mode Accessoires ganz unkompliziert online erwerben. Viele weitere Informationen zu Erkennungsmarken und Anregungen zu deren Verwendung laden den Besucher zudem zum durchstöbern der Seite ein.

description.hltext_display: Corea Sud: manovre militari terrestri
Dan Holladay
description.author: WW EDITORIAL STAFF
description.content:
A happy holiday story this isnt. In fact, this weeks Rogue, , is trying to extend misguided anti-government political activity to new depths.
So how is Holladay misspending his holidays?
Trying to gin up support for a ballot initiative that would let Clackamas County voters reverse a $5 biennial auto-registration fee the county recently passed to raise money toward the countys $22 million contribution to the $300 million cost of building a new Sellwood Bridge.
Two data points provide some context: Safety inspectors rate the 85-year-old span a two out of a possible 100 points, and a Metro traffic study found 70 percent of all trips across the bridge either begin or end in Clackamas County.
The latter finding provides a rationale for Clackamas County commissioners unanimous Dec. 9 vote to increase vehicle-registration fees by a little more than the price of a Happy Meal.
Soon afterward, Holladay announced he would try to gather the 6,332 signatures needed by Feb. 17 to qualify for the May ballot.
Holladay says the tax is simply backfilling money Portland Mayor Sam Adams wants to divert from the bridge project to Milwaukie light rail, and he objects to cross-jurisdictional payments. We have political subdivisions in Oregon, he adds. Clackamas County doesnt pay for Multnomah Countys jails. Holladay, an Oregon City electrician, is no political neophyte. He won election in 2003 to the Oregon City School Board and to the city commission in 1998. He has also run unsuccessfully for mayor and the Clackamas County Board of Commissioners.
As Holladay should know from his service on the school board and city council, one of the fundamental principles of democracy is shared sacrifice. Thats why everybody pays for schools and prisons, even though relatively few families use either.
Micromanaging $5 fee increasesespecially those that would rebuild the only bridge between Oregon City and downtown Portlandis not what our forefathers envisioned when they created citizen access to the ballot.

event_or_fact.property: he would try to gather the 6,332 signatures needed by Feb. 17 to qualify for the May ballot
the tax is simply backfilling money Portland Mayor Sam Adams wants to divert from the bridge project to Milwaukie light rail, and he objects to cross-jurisdictional payments
We have political subdivisions in Oregon

description.hltext_display: Asking And Telling Each And Every Week.
description.author: WW EDITORIAL STAFF
description.content:
Portland Public Schools voters will decide this May whether to increase their property taxes to pay for a $548 million construction bond. And donations to the pro-bond campaign have started pouring in. Multnomah County Chairman Jeff Cogens campaign fund gave $2,500 recently. And $1,000 has come in from both City Commissioner Nick Fishs campaign and from former mayoral candidate Sho via his Azumano Travel business. Also, Mark Edlen, the real-estate developer from Gerding Edlen LLC, gave $5,000. Gerding Edlen stands to gain from PPSs commitment to renewable energy; in 2009, Gerding Edlen teamed up with PPS to install solar panels on nine schools.
Repeat offense: After feeling heat from police-accountability activists, Police Chief Mike Reese and Mayor Sam Adams fired Officer Ronald Frashour last month over the fatal January shooting of 25-year-old Aaron Campbell. Now activists are once again calling for the termination of officers, this time Jonathan Kizzar and Kelly Jenson, who fatally shot Darryel Dwayne Ferguson on Dec. 17 outside a Southeast Portland apartment. The case is expected to go to a grand jury next week, says Multnomah County Chief Deputy District Attorney Norm Frink.
The Eastmoreland Neighborhood Association has raised $60,000 in private donations to maintain seven blocks of century-old linden trees lining Reed College Place (see ). Mayor Sam Adams promised the Southeast Portland neighborhood that the city would maintain the trees. But the city has not done so. Robert McCullough, a resident active in raising the funds, says Adams shouldnt view private donations as a way to pay for city services. The mayors job in The City That Works is to keep things working, McCullough says. Says Adams, Im looking forward to the city and the neighborhood continuing to work together. The recounts from Novembers general election have barely finished, but one group is already well on its way to the 2012 ballot. A group called Protect Oregon Homes 2012 has raised $250,000 to help pay for the 110,358 signatures required to propose amending the Oregon Constitution to prohibit a real-estate transfer tax. Variations of such a mechanism, effectively a sales tax on property transactions, exist in other states. And although theres no active push for one here, real-estate interests want to forestall any such possibility. This is more of a prospective effort, says Lake Oswego developer Barry Cain.
Thanks to our incredible readers, WWs Give!Guide has blown past the $500,000 mark in donations. And at 531,000-plus at press time, our holiday helper for 79 area nonprofits is about 20 percent ahead of where it was last year at this time. The deadline for giving is midnight on New Years Eve, so please help us make this years goal of $1 million by going to wweek.com/giveguide and contributing what you can. description.hltext_display: Was kann Handyortung - Service oder Spionage?
description.author: PR-Gateway
description.content:
"Finde heraus, wo sich deine Freunde gerade "rumtreiben", "Teste die Treue deines Partners", "Spionier" deiner Freundin hinterher". Mit solchen und ähnlichen Slogans wird vor allem im Internet zurzeit verstärkt für Dienste zur Ortung von Mobiltelefonen geworben. Schnell mag hier der Eindruck entstehen, jeder könne zu jeder Zeit jedes beliebige Mobiltelefon orten - und so seinen Partner, seine Freunde oder seine Familie ohne großen Aufwand auf Schritt und Tritt kontrollieren.
Ein Thema also, das viele Fragen aufwirft: Wen kann ich orten lassen? Kann jeder einfach so herausfinden, wo ich gerade bin? Und wie funktioniert eine Handy-Ortung überhaupt? Die fünf wichtigsten Fragen rund um die Handy-Ortung werden hier beantwortet.
Wie funktioniert eine Handy-Ortung?
Das Handynetz ist in wabenförmige Bereiche - sogenannte Zellen - eingeteilt, die von den einzelnen Funkmasten abgedeckt werden. Jedes eingeschaltete Mobiltelefon steht permanent durch GSM-Signale mit dem jeweils nächstgelegenen Funkmasten in Verbindung und kann so immer einer bestimmten Zelle zugeordnet werden. Dadurch lässt sich jederzeit der Standort des Handys ermitteln.
Wie genau ist eine Handy-Ortung?
Das hängt immer von der Netzabdeckung ab - es gilt: Je dichter die Funkmasten stehen, desto kleiner die Zellen und desto genauer die Ortung. In größeren Städten sind die Zellen wegen dichter Netzabdeckung sehr klein, so dass bis auf wenige Meter genau geortet werden kann. In ländlichen Gebieten mit geringer Netzabdeckung hingegen sind die Zellen größer - hier kann meist nur bis auf einige hundert Meter genau geortet werden.
Können alle Handys geortet werden?
Rein technisch ist die Ortung jedes Mobiltelefons möglich, unabhängig von Modell und Mobilfunknetz. Aus Datenschutzgründen erlaubt der Gesetzgeber eine Ortung jedoch nur, wenn der Besitzer des zu lokalisierenden Handys vorher sein Einverständnis gegeben hat. Eine Ausnahme ist die Eigenortung: Jeder kann Handys, die auf den eigenen Namen angemeldet sind, jederzeit orten. Eltern können somit neben den eigenen Handys auch die Geräte ihrer Kinder lokalisieren lassen.
Welchen Nutzen hat eine Handy-Ortung?
Wer sein Handy verloren hat oder wem es gestohlen wurde, kann das Mobiltelefon orten und so das Gerät wiederfinden. Außerdem können Eltern über die Handys ihrer Kinder schnell und unkompliziert herausfinden, wo der Nachwuchs sich gerade aufhält.
Wie kann ich ein Handy orten lassen?
Dazu muss man sich bei einem Ortungsdienst, wie zum Beispiel dem Service TrackYourKid der Gelsenkirchener ibs Sicherheitstechnik, anmelden. Per SMS an den Netzbetreiber werden die zu ortenden Handys zunächst für die Ortung freigeschaltet. Per Internet-Anfrage kann dann jederzeit der Standort der angemeldeten Mobiltelefone - uns so auch der ihrer Besitzer - ermittelt werden. Als einziger Ortungs-Service bietet TrackYourKid außerdem eine mobile Ortung per SMS-Anfrage an.
Weitere Informationen im Internet unter www.trackyourkid.de.
Mit ihrem Handy-Ortungsdienst TrackYourKid zeigt sich die ibs Sicherheitstechnik in Gelsenkirchen als seriöser und verlässlicher Partner. Das Angebot ist speziell auf die Bedürfnisse von Eltern zugeschnitten. Außerdem sind die erfahrenen Mitarbeiter bei Fragen und Problemen über eine Service-Hotline erreichbar. So müssen sich die Eltern keine all zu großen Sorgen machen, wenn der Nachwuchs mal alleine unterwegs ist - denn die Handy-Ortung bietet ein echtes Plus an Sicherheit.
ibs Sicherheitstechnik Pieper / Siegle GbR
Dirk Teubner
Ludwig-Erhard-Straße 4
45891 Gelsenkirchen
(0209) 31838-504
Kontakt
Dr. Schulz Business Consulting GmbH

description.hltext_display: Team honors Hudson, McMahon
description.author: Ira Schoffel
description.content:
Senior offensive linemen Rodney Hudson and Ryan McMahon left Florida State's practice fields for the final time late Tuesday morning, and they went out in style.
After the Seminoles wrapped up their final bowl practice in Tallahassee, FSU's younger offensive linemen hoisted the two four-year starters onto their shoulders and carried them off the field like royalty.
"Last time ever on this field," FSU coach Jimbo Fisher said, as the two veterans were carried toward the gate opening. "The last time they'll ever practice here."
Side by side, with Hudson at left guard and McMahon at center, the pair have started nearly every game of their college careers.
McMahon will leave FSU with the record for most consecutive starts by any player, and Hudson will depart as a consensus All-American.
Royalty indeed.
"Just don't drop him and hurt him," Fisher yelled with a smile.

event_or_fact.property: Just don't drop him and hurt him
Last time ever on this field; The last time they'll ever practice here.

description.hltext_display: 美女护士私拍不雅照遭破解曝光
Ravenna, pubblicità abusiva. Federpubblicità incontra Prefetto e comandante della PolStrada
description.content:
RAVENNA - Federpubblicità, associazione dei pubblicitari aderenti a Confesercenti, dopo aver sottolineato, con il comunicato stampa dello scorso settembre, le importanti modifiche apportate al Codice della Strada al fine di contrastare la pubblicità abusiva, ha avviato nei mesi scorsi una serie di confronti con i rappresentanti di Ravenna della Polizia Municipale e Polizia Stradale.
A conclusione dei confronti bilaterali martedì mattina Nevio Ronconi e Giacomo Costantini, rispettivamente Presidente e Coordinatore Provinciale di Federpubblicità, hanno incontrato il Prefetto Riccardo Compagnucci e il Comandante della Polizia Stradale Angelo Tancredi con l'obiettivo di mantenere a livello provinciale indirizzo e coordinamento per gli interventi di contrasto alla pubblicità abusiva.
Infatti le modifiche introdotte all'art.23 del Codice della Strada, che regolamenta la pubblicità sulle strade, grazie alla legge n. 120 del 29 luglio 2010 "Disposizioni in materia di sicurezza stradale" permettono l'accesso sul fondo privato ove è collocato il mezzo pubblicitario abusivo a tutti gli organi di polizia stradale previsti. Un'ulteriore modifica che introduce un termine di 60 giorni dopo i quali l'ente può liberamente disporre del mezzo pubblicitario, quindi anche procedendo alla sua distruzione.
Il Prefetto tenendo conto delle istanze promosse da Federpubblicità ha proposto di avviare nei prossimi mesi una serie di azioni in concerto con la Polizia Stradale e i Comuni della Provincia di Ravenna.

description.hltext_display: 'Dabangg' bags five awards at Big Star Entertainment Awards
description.content:
Salman Khan's blockbuster film 'Dabangg' bagged five trophies at the debut Big Star Entertainment awards on Tuesday night.
It won best film, best actor, best director, best entertaining song ("Munni badnaam hui") and best male singer Rahat Fateh Ali Khan for the song "Mast mast do nain".
Salman Khan won the most entertaining film actor award and Dharmendra bagged the Big star entertainer for 50 years of glory.
Many other winners of different categories were also announced and the awards will be aired Dec 31 on Star TV. The announcements were made by bigwigs such as Amitabh Bachchan, Aishwarya Rai, Vidya Balan, Karan Johar, Rajkumar Hirani, Vidhu Vinod Chopra, Tina Ambani and Sudhir Mishra, among others.

description.hltext_display: Dollars For Diplomas
description.author: NIGEL JAQUISS
description.content:
Portland State University is doing a great job at attracting students but not such a great job of graduating those same students.
And that fact will be a pressure point for PSU if the 2011 Legislature passes a mammoth, 400-page higher-ed reform bill that proposes to give Oregons seven public universities far greater autonomy in exchange for a higher level of accountability.
The bill would mean PSU must become less of a warehouse and more of a finishing school, because the focus of future public university funding would shift from enrollment to outcomes. Well set targets for graduation rates, says Senate Education Committee Chairman Mark Hass (D-Beaverton). And funding will be set according to those goals. Hass co-chaired a bipartisan panel that wrote the bill and introduced it to an interim committee last week. The measure enjoys strong bipartisan support, although a competing University of Oregon plan could muddy the waters.
Currently, the Legislature allocates money$821 million in the 2009-11 bienniumto Oregons seven public universities based on a formula that largely depends on enrollment. As part of an ambitious expansion in recent years, PSU has recruited foreign and out-of-state students and competed for those who might previously have headed to Eugene or Corvallis. But even as PSUs enrollment of 28,522 soared above that of Oregon and Oregon State, the universitys graduation rate remained low.
Federal stats show only 33 percent of those students who entered PSU in 2003 graduated within six years.
The national rate was 57 percent. At the University of Oregon, 70 percent graduated within six years, and at Oregon State the number was 60 percent. PSUs six-year graduation rate also places it well below the 41 percent average of the 14 urban universities it compares itself to (41 percent).
PSU professor Sukhwant Singh Jhaj, also a special assistant to the provost, is leading a project to identify reasons more students are not graduating.
Jhaj says there are two important points to consider when looking at graduation rates: First, its only one measure of a university; and second, as an urban, mostly community university, PSU does not operate in the same world as UO or OSU because PSU is not an enclosed traditional campus.
Still, Jhaj says, neither he nor his colleagues in the provosts office are defending the status quo. We know our graduation rate must improve, he says. Jhajs project has involved crunching data PSU had not previously analyzed to figure out who was falling through the cracks en route to graduation, and why.
Their findings are not terribly surprising but do suggest that if the Legislature approves the reform bill, PSU could look very different. Jhajs analysis found three primary factors determine whether students succeed at PSU: academic preparedness, the level of connectedness they feel to the university, and their financial and physical well-being. Although PSU nominally requires entering students to have a grade point average of 3.0 or higher, Jhaj found nearly one-third of students enrolled in basic courses that most entering students take had not met that standard.
Second, students often skipped fundamental steps such as attending freshman orientation and displayed little awareness of counseling or other support services that could help when they encountered difficulties.
The new plan is to front-load services, Jhaj says, so students know what resources are available when they are struggling to pay tuition or worried about other obstacles to graduation.
Hass, the Senate education committee chairman, applauds that approach. He says theres limited benefit to students or the state when both spend scarce dollars without having a diploma to show for the effort. At some point its incumbent on these institutions to take some responsibility for helping these kids succeed, Hass says. Setting some goals here should help change that. FACT: Of the 14 urban universities PSU compares itself to, the best six-year graduation rate for the class entering in 2003 was at University of North Carolina-Charlotte (54 percent). The worst was at the University of Arkansas-Little Rock (14 percent).

description.hltext_display: City's middle managers approve new contract
description.content:
The Folsom City Council has approved a three-year contract with the city's middle management employees that includes significant pension reform and other concessions that officials say will help the city achieve long-term sustainability.
Under terms of the agreement approved by the council last week, members of the Folsom Middle Management Group will pay higher health insurance contributions and the entire employee portion of PERS retirement contributions, according to a city news release. They will also forgo cost-of-living and market increases granted in a previous agreement. The existing one-day-per-month furlough will be discontinued.
In addition, future employees represented by the bargaining unit will be hired under a new pension formula, making them eligible for 2 percent at age 55 instead of 2.7 percent at age 55.
City Manager Kerry Miller said the Folsom Middle Management Group is the city's first non-safety bargaining unit to agree to such significant cost-saving employee benefit changes.
City officials said major provisions of the contract with middle management employees are similar to those contained in new contracts with Folsom Police Department bargaining units. The city's executive management staff is also paying its full share of PERS retirement contributions. � Cathy Locke

event_or_fact.property: the Folsom Middle Management Group is the city's first non-safety bargaining unit to agree to such significant cost-saving employee benefit changes

description.hltext_display: Lakers Coach Says Humbug To Christmas Games
description.author: GREG BEACHAM
description.content:
LOS ANGELES -- Phil Jackson says humbug to the NBA's Christmas schedule.
The 11-time NBA champion coach restated his longtime opposition to Christmas games Tuesday night before his Los Angeles Lakers faced the Milwaukee Bucks in their final tuneup before Saturday's visit from the Miami Heat.
"It's like Christian holidays don't mean to them anything any more," Jackson said. "Just go out and play and entertain the TV. It's really weird, but it is what it is. We have to go to work and make the best of it."
Jackson is the son of two Christian ministers, and he famously wrote a book on his spiritual growth related to basketball.
The Lakers have played on every Christmas since 1999, including three straight games against the Heat during Shaquille O'Neal's tenure after his trade from Los Angeles. Kobe Bryant has played on Christmas in 13 of his 15 NBA seasons - not including the 1998-99 season, which didn't begin until the new year due to the lockout.
Jackson hates the Lakers' annual spot in the showcase, noting the NHL and most other major sports usually take Christmas off.
"I don't think anybody should play on Christmas Day," Jackson said. "I don't understand it."
The coach doesn't sound interested in voicing those concerns in person to commissioner David Stern, however.
"He'll see it," Jackson said with a grin.
Jackson also objects to the proliferating number of Christmas games in recent seasons, after many years with a single or two holiday games. The NBA has scheduled five for Saturday, with Bryant's showdown against LeBron James and the revamped Heat at center stage.
Jackson said the timing of the game - and the 2 p.m. local start time, 5 hours earlier than the Lakers' usual tip-off - will reduce its importance.
"It's going to be Christmas, and you're going to have little kids putting batteries in toys and putting their Christmas presents together," Jackson said. "There's all kinds of crazy stuff going on, and now your head has got to get focused on the game, in the middle of the afternoon on Christmas Day."
Jackson believes the Lakers got overly amped about last season's Christmas meeting with the Cleveland Cavaliers, leading to a painful loss that ended with fans throwing dozens of novelty foam hands onto the court. A year earlier, Los Angeles snapped the Boston Celtics' 19-game winning streak in a rematch of the 2008 NBA finals.
Jackson would prefer to see those historic moments on other calendar dates.
"When I was in the CBA, we had a commissioner who scheduled a Christmas Eve game. I had to call him up and say, 'That's the holy time,'" Jackson said. "You just have to keep reminding them that this is a special day."

description.hltext_display: Samsung Bada 2.0: Verbesserte Oberfläche und NFC-Unterstützung
description.content:
Bild vergrößern 568 341 http://img2.magnus.de/Samsung-Bada-2-0-r568x341-C-964dd429-39048499.jpg © Samsung
Samsungs nächste große Version des Mobilbetriebssystems Bada soll eine bessere Bedienoberfläche, NFC-Kompatibilität und einen überarbeiteten Home-Screen bekommen.
Samsungs Eigenentwicklung, das Smartphone-Betriebssystem Bada, wird ein Jahr alt. Zeit für den koreanischen Elektronik-Riesen, ein großes Update herauszubringen.
Aktuell laufen Samsung-Smartphones, die ein "Wave" im Namen tragen, mit Bada in Version 1.2. Version 2.0, die im Frühjahr 2011 erscheinen soll, bringt etliche Neuerungen mit - wie es sich für ein Haupt-Update eben gehört. Allerdings verriet Samsung noch nicht, ob auch die "alten" Samsung Waves dieses Update bekommen sollen.
Bessere Oberfläche, NFC-Technologie
Eine der beiden Haupt-Neuerungen ist eine überarbeitete Oberfläche. Es sollen Animationen verwendet werden und der Home-Screen wird eine Auffrischung bekommen bzw. er wird laut Samsungs Präsentation "smarter". Die zweite große Neuerung ist die Unterstützung von NFC. Near Field Communication dient, wie's der Name schon sagt, dem Datenaustausch auf sehr kurze Distanz. Das Smartphone wird dabei im Abstand von wenigern Zentimetern etwa an ein Bezahlsystem gehalten, um Bank-Daten zum Begleichen der Rechnung zu übertragen. Oder man holt sich auf diese Weise Zusatzinfos zu Produkten ab. Künftige Smartphones müssen dazu einen entsprechenden Chip besitzen. Auch Google setzt auf diese Technologie und macht z.B. das Nexus S mit Android 2.3 dazu fähig.
Eine weitere Überarbeitung soll auch die Multitasking-Funktion erfahren. Zudem soll der Browser kpnftig Flashlite4 und HTML5 unterstützen und stärker auf Web-Apps ausgerichtet sein. Auf dem Chart findet man noch Schlagworte wie Spracherkennung, Text-to-Speech, Sicherheitsverbesserungen, Oberflächenpersonalisierung, Lifelogging und Push-Benachrichtigungen.
Für Entwickler erfreulich ist die Kompatibilität des SDK (Software Developer Kit) für Linux und Mac. Auch ist von offenen Standards wie C/C++ und Open AL die Rede.
Trotzdem, dass Bada noch in keinen Statistiken über die Verbreitung von Smartphone-Betriebssystemen auftaucht, kann Samsung seine Entwicklung als Erfolg verbuchen. In diesem Jahr wurden 5 Millionen Wave-Smartphones verkauft. Für das erste Halbjahr 2011 rechnet der koreanische Hersteller mit 10 Millionen verkaufter Smartphones mit Bada-Betriebssystem. Ob mit oder ohne den Verkäufen aus 2010 lässt Samsung offen.

description.hltext_display: HTC Incredible HD: Erste Bilder und Infos
description.content:
Bild vergrößern 560 336 http://img1.magnus.de/HTC-Incredible-HD-r560x336-C-8d955b05-39048147.jpg © slashgear
Das HTC Incredible HD, das auch unter dem Namen HTC Mecha auftaucht, soll ein LTE-Smartphone sein und eine Frontkamera besitzen.
Diverse US-Blogs haben einige Foto-Puzzlezeile vom HTC Incredible HD veröffentlicht. Wie für einzelne Puzzle-Teile üblich, ergeben sie zwar kein Gesamtbild, aber verraten Details. So kann man auf einem Bild (siehe Bildergalerie unten) die HTC-typisch hochwertige Verarbeitung erkennen.
Auf einem anderen Bild gibt es einen Blick unter die Haube und auf die 8-Megapixel-Kamera samt Doppelblitz. Dank den Bildern wissen wir nun auch, dass HTC das Incredible HD, wie seine anderen HTC-Kollegen, mit einem Micro-USB-Anschluss versieht. Zu guter Letzt kann man aus dem Bild der Rückseite ersehen, dass das Gerät wohl einen Aufsteller hat und relativ große ist - vermutlich sitzt vorne ein 4,3 Zoll großes Display.
Spekulationen zu dem HTC Incredible HD, das hin und wieder auch unter dem Namen HTC Mecha auftaucht, besagen, dass das Smartphone bereits mit der LTE-Technik (Long Term Evolution) ausgerüstet ist. Der Mobilfunkstandard der 4. Generation erlaubt schnellere Datenraten und soll auch in ländlichen Gebieten verfügbar sein. Allerdings kann man damit rechnen, dass das HTC Incredible HD zunächst in den USA bei Verizon erscheint, da der Anbieter dort ein Treiber für LTE ist.
Was das Betriebssystem angeht, setzen die Gerüchte auf Android 2.2. Wobei Android 2.3 wegen der Unterstützung von Frontkameras bzw. Videotelefonie mehr Sinn machen würde. Die neue Sense-Oberfläche wäre auf dem Gerät ebenfalls vorstellbar. Als Präsentations-Event wäre die Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas Anfang Januar 2011 ein guter Kandidat.

description.hltext_display: Aamir Khan on Katrina's wish list
description.content:
Katrina Kaif, who will soon be seen in Farah Khan's 'Tees Maar Khan', says she wants to act opposite Aamir Khan for her dream role.
"It's not one, I have three roles which I wish to do. First on the list is a period film, which are not made enough now. Second on my list is a romantic-tragedy - just like 'Devdas'. And thirdly, I want to do an action film like 'Salt' or 'Charlie's Angels'," Katrina told reporters.
When asked with whom she would want to team up, she said: "I want to team up with Aamir. In the last few films the way he has romanced on screen I loved it, specially in 'Ghajini'.
The star-studded award night is slated to take place Jan 29.

description.hltext_display: 少女当街抓狂裸奔 见人就打
مؤسسة بيمكو تنتقد استراتيجية البلدان الأوروبية لمواجهة الأزمة
description.content:
في وقت أعلن فيه بكل فخر القادة الأوروبيون الأسبوع الماضي عن اتفاقهم على الجهود التي يبذلونها لإنقاذ اليورو، رأت مؤسسة بيمكو أن التدابير التي تتخذها البلدان الأوروبية في هذا الشأن غير كافية، وأن بعض الدول قد يتعين عليها ترك إتحاد العملة الموحدة لفترة موقتة.
قال أندرو بوسموورث، رئيس إدارة المحافظ الاستثمارية لدى بيمكو "إن الآلية التي لجأ إليها القادة الأوروبيون غير كافية تقريباً، وأتت متأخرة للغاية. وتتمثل المشكلة في استمرار الحقيقة التي تقول إن المستثمرين يشكّون في أن بلادًا مثل أيرلندا واليونان والبرتغال ستكون قادرة على سداد ديونها"، طبقاً لما نقلت عنه صحيفة "داى فيلت" الألمانية. وأوضح بوسموورث أن "النتيجة كانت أن المستثمرين يحاولون بيع سنداتهم من الدول التي تعاني مشكلات، لكنهم غير قادرين على إيجاد أيّ مشترٍ بخلاف البنك المركزي الأوروبي. ويتواصل تصاعد أسعار الفائدة نتيجة لذلك بالنسبة إلى إيطاليا وإسبانيا وبلجيكا أيضاً. وهو ما يجعل الأمر أكثر كلفة بالنسبة إليهم كي يقترضوا، وتتزايد ديونهم، وهو الأمر نفسه بالنسبة إلى التهديد الخاص بالإعسار". جدير بالذكر أن أوروبا تواجه تلك المشكلة منذ الربيع الماضي، عندما أسفر النطاق الكامل لمشكلات الديون التي تواجه اليونان عن عمليات بيع مكثفة للسندات الحكومية اليونانية. وقد تدخل الاتحاد الأوروبي حينها بخطة إنقاذ قدرها 110 مليارات يورو ( 145 مليار دولار)، ثم تدخل بعدها بأسبوع بمبلغ قيمته 750 مليار يورو لدعم اليورو.
لكن هذا المبلغ لم يوقف التكهنات التي تحدثت عن أن بعض الدول الأعضاء في منطقة اليورو سوف تُجبَر في نهاية المطاف على الإفلاس والعجز عن الوفاء بديونها. وأصبحت إيرلندا آخر ضحايا تلك التكهنات في فصل الشتاء الحالي.
ويرى المستثمرون، شأنهم شأن بوسموورث، أن المشكلة التي تواجهها القارة العجوز هي مشكلة تحتاج أن تُحَل الآن. وشدد بوسموورث في هذا الصدد على ضرورة أن يجد الساسة الأوروبيون حلاً على وجه السرعة لمشكلة الإعسار. وقال إن المستثمرين لن يعودوا إلى الدول الأوروبية المتعثرة، إلا إذا عادت الثقة في نموها على المدى الطويل.
ولفت بوسموورث في السياق عينه إلى أن خطط التقشف الجذرية يمكن أن تحول دون هذا النمو. وخلص إلى أن الحل العملي الوحيد بالنسبة إلى اليونان وإيرلندا والبرتغال هو أن يغادروا اتحاد العملة الموحدة بصورة موقتة. وختم بقوله إن البلدان الأخرى المعرضة للخطر مثل إيطاليا وإسبانيا وبلجيكا ستحتاج أيضاً دعم زملائها الأعضاء في الاتحاد الأوروبي.

description.hltext_display: 'Tatjana is verliefd'
description.content:
AMSTERDAM - Tatjana Simic moet kiezen tussen een RTL 4-programma waarin zij op zoek gaat naar een potentile partner of de partner die zij al heeft. Dat schrijft De Telegraaf.
Volgens geruchten is Tatjana meer dan goede vrienden met haar buurman Chris van Eeghen. Daarmee zou de zoektocht van de actrice in Wie kiest Tatjana? slechts schijn zijn.
De Telegraaf schrijft woensdag dat RTL er daarom aan denkt de show af te blazen. Tatjana ontkent de geruchten overigens.
Bronnen binnen de zender laten volgens de krant weten dat het tekenen van het contract al twee keer is uitgesteld.
Ook was de op 28 januari gepland staande eerste aflevering tijdelijk geschrapt, maar inmiddels toch weer aangekondigd bij de adverteerders.

description.hltext_display: Uranium Stocks To Watch Out For
Frost & Sullivan Honors Aryaka Networks for "Product Innovation of the Year" in WAN Optimization
description.content:
Aryaka Networks (www.aryaka.com), provider of the world's first cloud-based application acceleration and WAN optimization solution, today announced that it has received the prestigious "Product Innovation of the Year" award in North America for WAN optimization, by Frost & Sullivan for 2010. As part of its award criteria, Frost & Sullivan ranked providers on five metrics -- product innovation, leading-edge technology, value-added features, customer ROI, and potential for customer acquisition and penetration -- and Aryaka outranked all competitors across these categories. Competitors for the award included leading, entrenched WAN optimization providers, which received "Good" or "Fair" ratings, in contrast to Aryaka's uniform rating of "Excellent."
Key to Aryaka's leadership in WAN optimization, as noted by Zeff Ibrahim, Frost & Sullivan Research Analyst, is a network design that allows customers to overcome the often severe ramp-up times and "exorbitant" network investment required to deploy WAN optimization.
"Aryaka's cloud-based solution for WAN optimization and application acceleration virtually eliminates the need for on-premise equipment at a company's headquarters and branch locations," said Mr. Ibrahim. "The implications are profound: the exorbitant capital investment in this historically capital-intensive technology is reduced to zero, and WAN optimization can be provisioned typically in minutes -- versus the more common phased, two-month or longer rollout. By enforcing cost containment and rapid time-to-productivity, Aryaka opens WAN optimization to the vastly underserved midmarket. It's a truly disruptive attack on the status quo."
"Aryaka set out to deliver a new model for WAN optimization and application acceleration that critics, quite literally, said could not be done," said Ajit Gupta, founder and CEO of Aryaka Networks. "We never doubted that a technology that so profoundly enables enterprises to outperform their competitors could be rearchitected to extend the benefits of that technology to midmarket organizations that, by nature, live with restrictive capital budgets and IT staffs. We are honored to accept this recognition from Frost & Sullivan."
About the New Product Innovation Award
Frost & Sullivan completed its assessment of the Innovation Award, calling the award a prestigious recognition of Aryaka Networks' accomplishments in the WAN Optimization domain. The firm went on to say that it researches, ranks and recognizes organizations that deliver excellence and best practices in their respective endeavors, hoping to inspire, influence, and impact three constituencies: investors, customers, and employees. The foundation of the awards is a decision support matrix that ranks providers on individually weighted key metrics indicating the value of a provider's offerings to user organizations.
About Frost & Sullivan
Frost & Sullivan, the Growth Partnership Company, enables clients to accelerate growth and achieve best-in-class positions in growth, innovation and leadership. The company's Growth Partnership Service provides the CEO and the CEO's Growth Team with disciplined research and best practice models to drive the generation, evaluation and implementation of powerful growth strategies. Frost & Sullivan leverages almost 50 years of experience in partnering with Global 1000 companies, emerging businesses and the investment community from 31 offices on six continents. To join our Growth Partnership, please visit http://www.frost.com.
About Aryaka Networks
Founded in November 2008, Aryaka Networks, Inc. delivers cloud-based WAN optimization and application acceleration with true business results. Headquartered in Milpitas, California, with offices in Bangalore, India, Aryaka is funded by Trinity Ventures, Mohr Davidow Ventures, Nexus Venture Partners and Stanford University. Key advantages of the Aryaka solution include a secure, scalable and reliable WAN optimization and application acceleration platform as a service, rapid deployment, ease of integration, complete visibility and a significantly lower total cost of ownership. For more information, visit www.aryaka.com.
Aryaka is a trademark of Aryaka Networks, Inc. All other brands, products or service names are or may be trademarks or service marks of their respective owners.

description.hltext_display: Caparros cautious after cup stalemate
description.content:
Athletic Bilbao coach Joaquin Caparros was a happy man after seeing his side hold mighty Barcelona to a goalless draw at the Nou Camp - but remained cautious about their chances of knocking the Catalan giants out of the Copa del Rey in the return leg at San Mames.
Last night's clash pitted the two most successful sides in Copa history against each other - Barca having 25 crowns to Athletic's 23 - and was a repeat of the 2009 final which the Catalan side won 4-1.
Barca also went into the last-16 first leg in stunning form, having won ten successive games with 42 goals scored and just four conceded, but they could find no way past a determined Athletic defence.
We were up against the best team in the world whose recent statistics were spine-chilling. I'm very happy with the performance of my players.
Joaquin Caparros, Athletic Bilbao coach
A pleased Caparros said: "We came here to have a great game and for that we had to be alert for the 90 minutes. We were up against the best team in the world whose recent statistics were spine-chilling, with many goals.
"Little by little the team became more comfortable defensively. Gorka (goalkeeper Iraizoz) was at a great level and gave confidence to the rest of the team. I'm very happy with the performance of my players. We were good defensively."
Caparros was not getting carried away however, even though his players will have the support of their famously passionate fans at what is sure to be a heated San Mames in the return leg.
"The tie is 50-50," he said. "There's no need to issue a rallying call to the fans. Now the supporters are going to be motivated, we are going to see a very nice atmosphere, because this is our competition. It's going to be difficult though, because Barca are Barca."

description.hltext_display: Ddl Gelmini, attesa a Roma per nuove proteste studenti
description.content:
ROMA (Reuters) - Gli studenti tornano a protestare per le strade di Roma e in molte altre città d'Italia contro la riforma dell'università oggi, giornata in cui è prevista l'approvazione definitiva del ddl Gelmini in Senato.
"Chiediamo di bloccare questo ddl e di rifinanziare tutto il settore dell'istruzione pubblica, chiediamo di cambiare la scuola e l'università partendo dalle proposte che portiamo in piazza da mesi, e che continueremo a portare. Anche se il ddl dovesse passare, infatti, noi continueremo a mobilitarci, anche dopo il periodo natalizio", fa sapere Rete degli Studenti in una nota.
Cortei, manifestazioni e altre iniziative sono previsti, oltre che nella Capitale, in città come Venezia, Palermo, Modena, Reggio Emilia, Perugia, Grosseto e Barletta.
Nella capitale, alle 9 è prevista la partenza di due cortei: uno degli studenti medi da Piramide e l'altro, degli universitari, da piazzale Aldo Moro, davanti all'ingresso dell'Università "La Sapienza".
Dove saranno diretti i due cortei "non si sa", ha detto a Reuters una portavoce della Rete degli Studenti: "Quello che e uscito dall'assemblea (di lunedì) è che non c'è l'intento di varcare la 'zona rossa' come le altre volte, ma il percorso non è ancora stato definito".
La Questura, secondo una fonte, è orientata a imporre una nuova "zona rossa" attorno ai palazzi delle istituzioni, anche se più "flessibile", mentre nel frattempo continuano i contatti tra forze dell'ordine e organizzazioni studentesche per evitare il ripetersi di incidenti.
Ieri la Questura di Roma ha annunciato che 60 persone sono state denunciate per manifestazione non preavvisata dopo il corteo dello scorso 14 dicembre seguito da gravi scontri tra dimostranti violenti e forze dell'ordine - che hanno provocato decine di feriti, danni che il sindaco di Roma ha stimato in diversi milioni di euro e oltre 20 arresti - e ha avvertito gli studenti che farà lo stesso se si dovessero svolgere nuove dimostrazioni senza il necessario preavviso.
-- Sul sito www.reuters.it le altre notizie Reuters in italiano. Le top news anche su www.twitter.com/reuters_italia

description.hltext_display: Masala films are tougher: Ashutosh Gowariker
description.content:
Acclaimed filmmaker Ashutosh Gowariker, best known for making period dramas like 'Lagaan' and 'Jodhaa Akbar', says it is challenging to make a typical Bollywood potboiler that excites the audience.
"I would love to make a glamourous movie sometime. But those movies seem easy to make, yet it is very difficult to make them. I don't know if I would ever make a completely mainstream film...but I don't mind making a murder mystery or a horror film," said Gowariker.
He did try his hand at commercial cinema with 'What's Your Rashee?', but it failed miserably at the box office. He returned to his trademark style with 'Khelein Hum Jee Jaan Sey', and is now ready to work on 'Buddha'.

description.hltext_display: Wetenschappers passen genen varroamijt aan
description.author: NU.nl/Dennis van Luling
description.content:
AMSTERDAM De toekomst voor de honingbij ziet er rooskleuriger uit. Britse wetenschappers hebben een genetische techniek ontwikkeld waardoor de varroamijt, een parasiet die voorkomt op insecten, minder schade aan kan richten op zijn gastheer. Deze nieuwe methode noemen zij RNA interference (RNAi). Zij veranderen een onderdeel van de genetische code in het organisme. De Britten schrijven over dit onderzoek in het tijdschrift . De varroamijt (Varroa destructor) plant zicht voort met het broed van honingbijen. Als een bij de parasiet op zijn lichaam heeft, wordt het imuumsysteem aangetast.
Met de expirimentele techniek schakelen de wetenschappers enkele genen van de mijt uit. Uiteindelijk zou dit tot een middel kunnen leiden dat de effecten van een varroamijtbeet uitschakelt.
Onderzoeker Giles Budge van de in het Engelse York maakt tegenover de BBC een metafoor. Als een mens een parasiet op zijn rug zou hebben die verhoudingsgewijs even groot zou zijn, zou dat een object ter grootte van een eetbord zijn, die een gat in je rug maakt om zichzelf en zijn familie te voeden.'' Dat enorme gat wordt niet meer gedicht. De parasiet zal er bloed door blijven drinken en injecteert virussen in het lichaam. De varroamijt wordt gezien als de grootste vijand van de hongbij. Duizend van deze parasieten, die er uitzien als miniscule bruine krabben, zijn in staat een kolonie van 50.000 bijen om te brengen.

description.hltext_display: Maailmanparantaja vie luomujouluaterian yksinhuoltajaperheille
description.content:
Muusikko-medianomi-laivanentisöijä Niklas Lönngren ystävineen aikoo ilahduttaa 50 yksinhuoltajaperhettä viemällä näihin ekologisen jouluaterian. Vähävaraiset perheet saavat joulupöytään muun muassa savustettua siikaa ja luomulaatikoita. Joulun alla ihmisten hyväntahtoisuus kumpuaa erilaisten avustustempausten muodossa. Tänä jouluna pieni hyvinvointiyhdistys Suorat Putket ry:n vetäjä Niklas Lönngren halusi ilahduttaa yksihuoltajaperheitä.
– Nimenomaan lasten takia. Luomuruoka ei saa olla stokkalla ja keskustan luomukaupoissa pyörivän eliitin harrastus, vaan myös vähävaraisten perheiden lapsilla pitää olla oikeus puhtaaseen ruokaan.
Lönngren kertoo olevansa periksi antamaton kun hän jotain saa päähänsä. Hän sai houkuteltua porukkaan "jankuttamalla" raaka-aineiden myyjiä ja ruokaa laittavia vapaaehtoisia.
– Vähän Vito Corleone -tyyliin! No, totta puhuen kaikki tulivat kyllä omasta tahdostaan tähän juttuun mukaan.
Lähistön kaupat ja luomutorit sponsoroivat jouluateriaa. Perheille annettavassa paketissa on savusiikaa, luomulaatikoita, rosollia, luomuleipää, pähkinä-suklaaherkkupussi.
– Ei kinkkua, sillä kinkun ei mielestäni tarvitse olla synonyymi jouluruualle.
Alun perin myös ruuan toimitustavan piti olla ekologinen. Lönngren ja muut vapaaehtoiset olisivat kuljettaneet luomupakkaukset potkukelkalla perille. Mutta Yhden Vanhemman Perheiden Liiton etsimät vähävaraiset yksinhuoltajaperheet eivät asuneetkaan potkukelkkamatkan päässä.
– Perheet on ripoteltu sinne tänne kauempana keskustasta, joten toimitamme ruuan kahdella henkilöautolla.
Lönngren haluaa laajentaa projektia ensi jouluna.
– 200 miljoonaa lasta elää nälkärajan alapuolella. Voinko minä syödä aladdinkonvehteja jouluaattona ahdistumatta? En voi, joten halusin tehdä jotain hyvää. Tämä ei ole mikään wannabe-maailmanparantajajuttu. YLE Helsinki

description.hltext_display: Flabby Charities
description.author: JAMES PITKIN
description.content:
Tis the season for do-gooders in our recession-hit city to reach deep and choose among hundreds of worthy causes to support with their hard-earned dollars.
But not all charities are alike. Some spend more than others on overhead costs, including fundraising and management expenses.
Charity Navigator, a New Jersey-based group that evaluates nonprofits, sets 65 percent as the bare minimum charities should spend on actual charity workrather than fundraising and administration. Nine out of 10 charities nationwide meet that standard. Anybody out of that realm is really underperforming, according to industry standards, says Matt Viola, a senior program analyst at Charity Navigator.
For discerning donors, the Oregon Department of Justice runs an online database (doj.state.or.us) that tracks spending by all 14,826 nonprofits registered in the state. The database breaks down each nonprofits spending for program services, fundraising and management.
With Charity Navigators standard in mind, we used the state database to calculate how much Portland-based nonprofits are spending directly on programs. Below is a list of 10 Portland charities that failed to exceed the BBBs 65 percent bar, according to the DOJ. (Yes, we include two that are right on the line.)
We applied our test only to charities that bring in more than $500,000 a yeara line Viola recommends because it includes only significant players. And because were focusing on charities that want your money, we removed from the list nonprofits that do not solicit donations or perform charitable work.
1. Charity: The Oregon Jewish MuseumMission Statement: To preserve history as it relates to the Jewish people.Program Spending: 48 percent
What They Said: Museum director Judy Margles says an accountant put the entire $60,000 salary for the director of development and programming under fundraising, when some of that money should have been listed as providing services. Were sort of the model of fiscal caution and conservatism, Margles says. 2. Charity: P:earMission Statement: Builds positive relationships with homeless and transitional youth through education, arts and recreation.Program Spending: 56 percentWhat They Said: The administrative staff of P:ear works directly with kids, [and] we straddle doing all of the administrative work as well, says Executive Director Beth Burns. P:ear is in this years WW Give!Guide. 3. Charity: Boy Scouts of America, Cascade Pacific CouncilMission Statement: To administer Boy Scouts of America program of character development and citizenship training.Program Spending: 56 percent
What They Said: Scouts spokesman Don Cornell did not reply to a phone message seeking comment.
4. Charity: Alzheimers Disease and Related Disorders Association, Oregon ChapterMission Statement: To offer support and assistance to the families of Alzheimers patients.Program Spending: 59 percent
What They Said: Board president Karen Garst says the nonprofit wrongly listed some expenses, such as the annual Memory Walk, as purely fundraising. Thats not just fundraising. Thats also public awareness, Garst says. Were incredibly frugal. 5. Charity: All Classical Public MediaMission Statement: Classical Music Public Radio/Community Engagement. (It operates All Classical 89.9 FM.)
Program Spending: 60 percentWhat They Said: It all depends on interpretation and allocations, says Sharon Johnson, vice president of marketing and development. She declined to speak further by phone, requesting questions by email. An email sent Dec. 17 received no response.
6. Charity: CASA for ChildrenMission Statement: To intervene on behalf of neglected or abused dependent children.Program Spending: 63 percentWhat They Said: I dont know if thats true, first of all, and if it is, the person you need to talk to just walked out the door two minutes ago, said CASA supervisor Letha McCleod. She referred WW to finance director Joni Spencer, who did not return a message from Dec. 17.
7. Charity: BodyVoxMission Statement: The creation and performance of dance-based theatrical presentations.Program Spending: 63 percentWhat They Said: We just recently completed a capital campaign and moved into a new building. That would explain where some of the expenditures on overhead were, said general manager Una Loughran. Most of what we do is program-driven. 8. Charity: Ronald McDonald House Charities of Oregon and Southwest WashingtonMission Statement: To acquire, develop and manage a facility for housing leukemia/oncology and other child patients and their families.Program Spending: 63 percentWhat They Said: Rather than rely on a single standard to measure our effectiveness, we constantly evaluate our performance using many different criteria, Executive Director Tom Soma said by email. I invite anyone to visit our two Ronald McDonald houses, meet some of the 1,500 families with seriously ill children who stay here each year, and then determine if were delivering on our promise. 9. Charity: Equity FoundationMission Statement: To benefit gay and lesbian people through grants.Program Spending: 65 percentWhat They Said: Our focus is very much on being cautious with expenses and focusing on our core mission, says Executive Director Peter Cunningham. Fundraising is a huge component of a nonprofit these days. 10. Charity: Junior Achievement of Oregon and Southwest WashingtonMission Statement: To educate boys and girls in the basic concepts of Americanism and the American private enterprise system.Program Spending: 65 percentWhat They Said: We acknowledge its close, says president John Hancock. Were happy to be at the...standard, especially in challenging economic times.

description.hltext_display: الشركات التشيكية تعوّل على الكريسماس لزيادة أرباحها
description.content:
تكثفت حركة الشراء في المحال التجارية قبل أيام قليلة من حلول عيد الميلاد المجيد، الأمر الذي زاد من دخل الشركات، ولاسيما الكبيرة منها. براغ: وبالنظر إلى كون معظم العائلات التشيكية تتناول في "عشاء الميلاد "السمك، فإن هذا القطاع يشهد حركة استثنائية قبل أيام قليلة من الميلاد، حيث تباع منه أطنان عديدة، وكذلك حركة بيع الأشجار، حيث تقدر إدارة الثروة الحرجية بأنه يتم سنويًا بيع 1.5 ـ 2 مليون شجرة قبل الكريسماس.
المحال الكبيرة شهدت أيضًا، ولاسيما خلال عطلة نهاية الأسبوع، تناميًا كبيرًا في الأرباح مع تدفق الآلاف إليها لاقتناء هدايا الميلاد. وحسب شركة تيسكو ستوريس فقد حضر إليها خلال عطلة نهاية الأسبوع عدد من الزبائن يزيد بمقدار 50% عن نهايات الأسبوع العادية. أما قيمة المشتريات فقد تضاعفت من جراء هذه الزيادة.
بالتوافق مع ذلك، أعلنت شركة البيرت بأن دخلها ارتفع خلال عطلة نهاية الأسبوع بمقدار 40% مقارنة بالأيام العادية. أما مقارنة بالفترة نفسها من العام الماضي فقد سجلت زيادة بنسبة 10%، في حين ارتفع عدد الناس الذين زاروا محالها المختلفة بمقدار 20 %.
وتشير معظم المحال التجارية الكبيرة إلى أن أكثر المنتجات التي يشتريها التشيك هذا العام هي الألبسة، ثم أدوات التجميل، فالألعاب، وبعد ذلك تحلّ الكتب والالكترونيات. ويؤكد أوندرجيه غازيك من وكالة ريسبونج آند كو، التي نفذت استطلاعًا بين المواطنين التشيك، أن نصف عدد التشيك يشترون الألبسة وأدوات التجميل والألعاب، وأن كل مواطن يريد هذا العام تقديم 6 هدايا بمعدل وسطي. أما القيمة التي يريد إنفاقها على ذلك فهي 7160 كورون، أي حوالي 375 دولارًا.

Según el estudio, los usuarios de Facebook en nuestro país ascienden a la cantidad de 12.196.630 personas mayores de 13 años. La segmentación por sexo ha revelado que hay mayor número de mujeres registradas en la red ...

description.hltext_display: Don't compare Sachin with others: Amitabh Bachchan
description.content:
Amitabh Bachchan says he is very proud of Sachin Tendulkar for being the first cricketer to score 50 Test centuries, but is miffed at constant attempts by the media to compare him with legends like Don Bradman.
"Why must there be a debate or even a discussion on whether Sachin is greater than Don Bradman or not? Sachin is greater, period! By bringing the topic up for debate you are somewhere unsure whether he really is deserving of being great or not. And this is objectionable to me," Amitabh posted on his blog.
"How much more does one have to do to prove one's credentials? And who are the media to concur who is great or not? We know he is. Matter over. Do not, I plead, bring down the stature of this great son of the land by continuously comparing him to others. Let others compare themselves to him. Why do we always play it the other way around?
"Why do we always want to describe our achievement or subject with a comparison from the West. Alright, the West is far developed than us, is richer materially, advanced and secure. So how does this give us the need to comment that they are superior. Or that the best comes from there and not here," he wrote.
Amitabh says he is also disturbed about how the media always asks him about his Hollywood ventures and feels it is time that Indians start taking pride in their own talent.
"'When will you be working in a Hollywood film, Mr Bachchan?', is often asked of us. 'We want to see you win an Oscar' .. or 'When will this film go to the Oscars?' See we have already accepted defeat. We have concluded beyond any argument that the Oscars and Hollywood are superior than us. That is a title that marks the highest honor. I have no qualms in accepting that Hollywood is far advanced, but that does not still make it the final destination.
"Why should it? Take pride in our own system. Why ... oh this is the Tom Cruise of the Hindi film industry, or so and so is the Brad Pitt of...when we go to introduce a subject or issue or character. Why can it not be that Tom Cruise is the Shah Rukh Khan, or Brad is the Salman of...! When we shall take pride in our own heroes without any comparison to others, we will find others complimenting our sentiments, looking up to us, and putting us on that pedestal where we belong," posted Amitabh.
He also hoped that all Indians "learn to acknowledge our own achievements".

description.hltext_display: Oorlogswinter in Amerikaanse bioscopen
description.content:
LOS ANGELES - De Nederlandse film Oorlogswinter van regisseur Martin Koolhoven gaat half maart draaien in de Amerikaanse bioscopen. Dat heeft de Amerikaanse distributeur Sony Pictures Classics gemeld op zijn website.
Oorlogswinter is de verfilming van het gelijknamige boek van Jan Terlouw over de 14-jarige Michiel (Martijn Lakemeier) die met zijn familie probeert de laatste winter van de Tweede Wereldoorlog te overleven. De film trok in Nederland rond de 850.000 bezoekers.
De Nederlandse film werd begin 2010 aangekocht door Sony toen hij op een shortlist stond voor de Oscar voor beste buitenlandse productie. Uiteindelijk sleepte Oorlogswinter geen nominatie in de wacht. De productie werd ook verkocht aan onder meer Australië, Ierland, Engeland, Duitsland, Nieuw-Zeeland, Frankrijk, Oostenrijk en China. (ANP)

description.hltext_display: Eindhoven Airport: recordaantal passagiers
description.content:
EINDHOVEN - Eindhoven Airport heeft dit jaar de grens van twee miljoen passagiers doorbroken. Dit jaar vlogen 2,14 miljoen passagiers van en naar Eindhoven Airport. Dat is een kwart meer dan in 2009 (1.712.000). Dat liet de regionale luchthaven woensdag weten.
Volgens de regionale luchthaven is een toename van het aantal nieuwe bestemmingen de belangrijkste oorzaak van de groei. Vanaf Eindhoven Airport kan worden gevlogen naar 32 lijndienstbestemmingen. Eind 2009 waren dat er nog 23.
Voor volgend jaar verwacht Eindhoven Airport 15 procent meer passagiers te vervoeren. (ANP)

description.hltext_display: 帅哥微笑抢劫 被称“最温柔劫匪”
Bad Bank: Irlands Friedhof für gescheiterte Bankerträume
description.author: Marcus Theurer, London
description.content: Hinter dem Bandwurmnamen verbirgt sich einer der größten europäischen Friedhöfe für gescheiterte Bankerträume. Als die irische Regierung die staatliche Auffanggesellschaft („Bad Bank") im Herbst 2009 gründete, war die National Asset Management Agency (Nama) als Befreiungsschlag zur Rettung des irischen Bankensystems gedacht. Jetzt hat Frank Daly, der Chef der Regierungsagentur, eine schwindelerregende Bilanz gezogen: Die Nama habe von den fünf größten Krisenbanken 11.000 Hypothekenkredite in Nominalwert von 71,2 Milliarden Euro erworben - eine Summe, die knapp 45 Prozent des irischen Bruttoinlandsprodukts entspricht. Weil die übernommenen faulen Hypothekendarlehen mit Gebäuden besichert sind, ist die Nama unfreiwillig zu einer der größten Immobilieneigner in Europa geworden. Tausende oft leerstehende oder erst halbfertige Investitionsruinen im Irland gehören heute der Regierung. Und nicht nur dort: In London etwa zählt die legendäre Battersea Power Station, ein stillgelegtes Kraftwerk im Herzen der Stadt, zum Nama-Besitz, weil ihr Verkauf von irischen Banken finanziert wurde. Die Nama ist heute umstritten. Vor einem Jahr wurden die Iren für ihren beherzten Plan zur Bankenrettung international gelobt. Heute gilt die Nama eher als Teil des Problems, das Irland im November nach Griechenland zum zweiten Rettungsfall für die anderen Euro-Länder und den Internationalen Währungsfonds gemacht hat. „Die Nama war eine schlechte Idee, die zu einem Fehlschlag wurde", lautet das Fazit einer Analyse des Wertpapierhändlers Lombard Street im Auftrag der irischen Bauindustrie. Die Idee war radikal und zögerlich zugleich: Der Staat zwang Großbanken wie die berüchtigte Anglo Irish Bank, Allied Irish Banks und Bank of Ireland, Tausende faule Immobilienkredite mit einem hohen Wertabschlag an die Nama zu verkaufen. Wegen der daraus folgenden Abschreibungen müssen die Banken zwar hohe Verluste verkraften, aber sie können mit sauberen Bilanzen einen Neuanfang beginnen. So weit die Theorie. In der Realität erwiesen sich die Wertabschläge auf die Schrottkredite der Banken und damit deren Abschreibungen aber als viel höher als angenommen. Statt der anfangs erwarteten rund 70 Cent je verliehenem Euro zahlte die Nama den Banken nur 42 Cent je Euro für ihre Schrotthypotheken. Der Verkauf riss riesige Löcher in die Eigenkapitaldecken der Banken, die vom Staat aufgefüllt werden mussten und schließlich die Reserven des kleinen Landes überforderten. . Was hätte man besser machen können? Einigkeit herrscht heute, dass die dem Zwangsverkauf vorausgehende Bewertung der Ausfallrisiken von Tausenden Krediten viel zu lange dauerte. Die monatelange Hängepartie schürte das Misstrauen der Märkte gegenüber den irischen Krisenbanken und verschärfte die Liquiditätsprobleme weiter. Eine vollständige Verstaatlichung wäre schneller gegangen, argumentiert der Ökonom Karl Whelan vom University College in Dublin. „Die Nama zwang die Banken außerdem dazu, ihre Verluste auf dem Tiefpunkt des Marktes und damit zum schlechtesten Zeitpunkt überhaupt zu realisieren", sagt Michael Taylor, Analyst bei Lombard Street. Text: F.A.Z.Bildmaterial: dpa

description.hltext_display: FC Twente walst over Vitesse heen
description.content:
Chadli van FC Twente © anp
ENSCHEDE - FC Twente heeft het kampioensjaar 2010 dinsdagavond fraai afgesloten met een klinkende bekerzege op Vitesse. Op het goed bespeelbare veld van de koude Veste werd het 5-0. FC Twente begint aan de winterstop in de wetenschap dat het volgend jaar nog op drie fronten meedoet.
Aanvankelijk zag het er niet naar uit dat Vitesse simpel aan de kant zou worden gezet. Sterker nog, in het eerste halfuur was het elftal van de Spaanse coach Albert Ferrer zelfs beter. Aardige schoten van Ismaïl Aissati, Dalibor Stevanovic en Nemanja Matic werden gestopt door Sander Boschker. De routinier in het Enschedese doel voorkwam daarmee herhaaldelijk een achterstand van de thuisclub.
Een misser van Eloy Room gaf het duel in de 29e minuut een ander aanzien. De Vitesse-doelman blunderde bij een afstandschot van Theo Janssen, dé man van FC Twente van de eerste seizoenshelft. Room liet de inzet van de middenvelder simpel onder zich door glippen. Dat ene moment leek Vitesse te breken.
''Vervolgens hebben we een uur goed gespeeld'', zei trainer Michel Preud'homme naderhand. ''Dat stemt tot tevredenheid. Ik had graag gezien dat we meteen goed waren begonnen. Maar het veld was niet gemakkelijk en we hadden door de blessures veel relatief nieuwe jongens opgesteld. Dat zijn wel verklaringen.''
Nog in het eerste deel liep FC Twente uit naar 4-0. Luuk de Jong maakte de tweede uit een strafschop, nadat hij zelf door Slobodan Rajkovic (ex-Twente) onderuit was gehaald. Vervolgens stuiterde een diepe pass van Janssen zomaar langs Room, die in de war werd gebracht door de voor hem opspringende De Jong. In de 44e minuut maakte Nacer Chadli 4-0, op aangeven van De Jong.
Dan te bedenken dat FC Twente nogal gehavend aan de wedstrijd was begonnen. Trainer Michel Preud'homme kon niet beschikken over de aanvallers Marc Janko en Bryan Ruiz. Denny Landzaat was evenmin fit genoeg om te spelen. In het doel stond Boschker in plaats van eerste keus Nikolai Michailov en Dwight Tiendalli begon op de bank, nadat hij kort voor het duel vader was geworden.
Ook in het tweede deel wilde FC Twente het publiek niet in de kou laten staan en bleef het jagen op meer treffers. De Jong zorgde na een uur voor nummer vijf. Leuk was ook het moment dat Janssen een vrije trap op de binnenkant van de ene paal schoot en Wout Brama in de rebound op de binnenkant van de andere paal knalde.
In de slotfase kreeg Janssen nog een publiekswissel, in wat mogelijk zijn laatste wedstrijd voor FC Twente was. ''Ik weet niet hoe mijn toekomst eruit ziet'', zei de beste man van het veld. ''Het is afwachten. Ik ga nu eerst een paar telefoontjes beantwoorden. Dan op vakantie. Misschien weten we daarna meer.' (ANP)

description.hltext_display: 'Tees Maar Khan' claims new victim - in Nepal
description.content:
"Tees Maar Khan", the "great" Indian criminal, the likes of whom are born only once in a blue moon, and who "steals, cheats and cons with amazing audacity" has struck again - this time in Nepal.
When Nepali film director Dev Kumar Shrestha announced his new film, the first supernatural thriller in Nepal, would be released on Christmas eve, he was not deterred by the thought of theatre-goers being diverted by festivities or new Nepali films releasing simultaneously with star-studded casts, or for that matter, 'Tees Maar Khan'.
However, the 38-year-old was forced to call a press conference on Monday to concede that "Ek din, ek raat" would now be shown a week later, from Dec 31.
'Tees Maar Khan', Bollywood's much-hyped new action comedy directed by Farah Khan and starring Akshay Kumar as the super rogue and Katrina Kaif as his leading lady, is being released internationally Dec 24 and Shrestha decided not to take any chances.
"Nepalis are avid watchers of Hindi films," Shrestha told us. "Besides being preceded by a lot of hype, 'Tees Maar Khan' is a big-budget film made under a big banner and with big stars."
By contrast 'Ek din, ek raat', despite receiving considerable pre-release publicity in Nepal, was made on a budget of NRS 8 million - Rs.5 million in Indian currency - which would be considered peanuts in India's mega-billion-rupee spinning film industry.
It also deliberately avoided signing up big names, instead opting for theatre artistes with a solid reputation for acting skills.
Unlike most Nepali films, 'Ek din, ek raat' would be screened in Jai Nepal, one of the best theatres in Kathmandu that shows only exceptional Nepali films. So with the multiplex also releasing 'Tees Maar Khan' Friday, Shrestha thought it prudent not to take the big Bollywood rival head-on.
In Nepal, it is not Nepali directors but Bollywood that still remains the film industry's biggest competitor.
When Manisha Koirala's comeback film in Nepali after two decades in Bollywood was released earlier this month, director Dipendra K. Khanal decided to change the title to 'Dharmaa'.
The original title was 'Rajniti' but Khanal feared it would seem a copy of Bollywood director Prakash Jha's political drama by the same name that was released in Nepal as well and lauded, even by top Maoist leaders who had once advocated banning Hindi films in Nepal.
Veteran Nepali film maker Yubaraj Lama decided to shelve making a film on the Buddha after the news broke that Bollywood director Ashutosh Gowariker was also making a film on the same subject.
However, despite Shrestha's retreat, 'Tees Maar Khan' may not have an entirely triumphant reign in Nepal.
It is bound to be regarded critically, especially as Akshay Kumar's earlier film, 'Chandni Chowk to China', was banned in Nepal last year after director Nikhil Advani's kungfu comedy triggered public protests due to the script, which erroneously said the Buddha was born in India.
The founder of Buddhism was born in southern Nepal and the wrong note led to the then Maoist government ban the film in Nepal.
