description.hltext_display: SUA: Stare de urgenţă în sudul Californiei, din cauza ploilor puternice.
description.author: redactia@romanialibera.ro (Victor Turșan
description.content:
SUA: Stare de urgenţă în sudul Californiei, din cauza ploilor puternice
SUA: Stare de urgenţă în sudul Californiei, din cauza ploilor puternice (Foto: AP)
SUA: Stare de urgenţă în sudul Californiei, din cauza ploilor puternice (Foto: AP)
E-MAIL PRINT RSS MĂRIME TEXT
de VICTOR TURȘAN
25 VIZUALIZARI | COMENTARII 0
Guvernatorul Californiei, Arnold Schwarzenegger, a declarat stare de urgenţă în mai multe comitate din sudul statului, din cauza ploilor puternice care au căzut în zonă, transmite miercuri EFE, citat de Agerpres.
Starea de urgenţă afectează comitatele Kern, Orange, Riverside, San Bernardino, San Luis Obispo şi Tulare, care au suferit pagube importante din cauza precipitaţiilor, a informat Biroul Guvernatorului Californiei, pe pagina de internet.
Ploile torenţiale şi vânturile puternice au impus evacuarea foarte multor persoane, deschiderea unor centre de adăpost, dar şi închiderea căilor de comunicaţii. Există, totodată, pericolul de alunecare a pământului şi a rocilor, se menţionează în declaraţia dată de Schwarzenegger.
La rândul său, guvernatorul Utah, Gary Herbert, a afirmat că este pregătit să declare stare de urgenţă în zonele din sudul statului, unde creşterea nivelului râurilor a dus la prăbuşirea unui pod, obligând autorităţile să evacueze Rockville, o localitate cu numai 300 de locuitori.
'Urmărim îndeaproape activitatea desfăşurată în sudul statului Utah şi ne rugăm pentru ca toţi locuitorii din zonă să fie în siguranţă', a anunţat biroul guvernatorului Gary Herbert, într-un comunicat.
Furtuna, care afectează statul California, îşi are originea în Pacific, lângă Insulele Hawai. Fenomenul meteo a adus ninsori în punctele mai înalte ale statului şi ploi torenţiale în zonele joase.

description.hltext_display: Gift card-a perfect outlet for your emotions!
description.content:
Are you among those few people who feel shy in expressing their love for their loved ones? Are you among those who just go speechless and numb when it comes to expression of love in front of your sweetheart? If you are among all those, then donot worry because you have one of the best option in hand- a gift card! If you feel too bashful and go bowled over in terms of expression then nothing can be better than a gift card for you!
A gift card has the ability to say what you cannot speak up. It allows a perfect blend of love, expression and class-all at the same time. A gift card can noticeably express what your lips could not put into words. So, for the next time, when you meet up your sweetheart and donot know what to say, how to say-donot worry because you have a gift card! Gift card has developed as a much preferred gifting item from quite a few years now. All of you can go high-tech in your expressions with a gift card. You can capture a million hearts by just a few clicks. Internet has provided you accessibility to all the things with just a click of a mouse and gift card is the most suitable example of that.
In maximum times, a gift card has always worked wonders in context of expressions and emotions. Infact, it is also a very viable option for the corporate world too. Fortunately, these days, gift cards have become customized too to suit your demands. They can be tailor-made as per your requirement. Whether you want a card designed with a photo of your grandmother, or your beloved, whether it is the wedding picture or the picture of your baby- you can personalize the design as per your needs truly! All-in-all you can fabricate the card design to meet your specific needs. You can add a custom message, or a photograph, to make it unique, individualized and exclusive! As far as corporate are concerned, they can alter a gift card to represent gratitude or love for a particular employee for his/her performance. Gift card is a perfect blend of class and emotions. It is a perfect vent to your emotions!
A gift card is something which is as good as cash and also as far as desire is concerned, I is the second most desired gift by women and third most by the men! You can now imagine how popular and extensively acceptable a gift card is! Initially, people had access to merely a few options and therefore there were less choices and selection criterions. But with the advancement of time, things have changed and so has the perception of people to represent their love. A gift card is a replica of that perception and advancement where you can let your choices flow freely and select the one that is convenient for you, even in terms of your budget! So if you had been thinking too much on the kind of gift to present to someone, bring a halt to your thoughts and go get a gift card, right now!

description.hltext_display: ROUNDUP: Leichte Entspannung am Frankfurter Flughafen
Bias Claims on the Rise
description.content:
With the latest recession being hailed as the worst in U.S. history, the record-setting EEOC claims in two of the past three years make sense. But that doesn't make it any easier for HR leaders, who must both respond to current problems as well as prevent future ones.
During fiscal year 2010, the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission received a record 99,922 job-bias charges -- the highest number in the agency's 45-year history. The 2009 EEOC bias claims numbered 93,277, only a slight drop from the previous record set in 2008 at 95,402.
Those record numbers should not shock anyone because, when recession hits, higher numbers of job-bias claims are sure to follow, say employment-law and HR experts. And that occurs despite the substantial money and time employers spend annually trying to staunch that from happening.
"The spike in charges over the last few years -- it has been a trend -- is largely due to economic conditions," says labor and employment attorney Kevin Vance, a Miami-based partner at Epstein Becker Green.
"I would expect the numbers to fall off some as the economy improves," he says, "but it is possible that the recent passage of some employee-friendly laws and the more aggressive approach the EEOC is taking under the Obama administration may keep the numbers high."
In fact, the EEOC under President Obama has stepped up its staffing and enforcement efforts during the past two years, as the Commission has begun to "replenish its depleted ranks" and dedicate significant resources to training employees, the largest sustained training effort the agency has conducted in at least a decade, according to the agency.
"The EEOC is on the path toward rebuilding and on track to make further progress in the upcoming fiscal year to more efficiently and effectively enforce the federal laws prohibiting employment discrimination," says EEOC Chair Jacqueline A. Berrien.
While the 2010 breakout of specific categories is not yet available (the EEOC will release them in early 2011), retaliation became the most frequently cited form of on-the-job discrimination in 2009 (33,613 charges), overtaking race discrimination (33,579 charges) by a slim margin.
Where does that leave HR executives, who are trying their best to reduce exposure to bias claims in 2011 and beyond?
Matt Morris, senior employment counsel at Aon Hewitt in Lincolnshire, Ill., emphasizes that HR needs to go beyond simple training and policy creation, especially with retaliation claims that are now becoming so much more prevalent.
"The more layoff events you have, the more people will file latent discriminatory claims," he says, noting that, in boom times, most people find new employment relatively quickly, so economic damages are limited.
"The better something is for your life, the worse it is for your case, and the opposite is true too," he says. "More people that are let go and the less chance to be rehired, the more EEOC claims will pour in."
Training should focus on managers, says Stephen Paskoff, a former EEOC attorney and president and CEO of ELI, Inc., an ethics and compliance learning provider in Atlanta -- especially on new and subtle areas that are directly connected to the rise in retaliation and Americans with Disabilities claims.
On the retaliation front, for example, Paskoff says, not only are people losing jobs, but stress levels within the workforce -- resulting from the push to "do more with less" -- are driving the rise in claims.
The more stress, the more "bad behavior" by mangers, he says.
"It's clear when employers don't hire as many people and release many as well, people staying employed will feel their jobs are in jeopardy, and negative comments by managers or supervisors made quickly and without much thought will cause people to feel mistreated," Paskoff says. "So if they do lose their jobs, the tendency is to connect those comments to the layoff -- even if there is no real connection.
"It may not be illegal, but it can feel like discrimination to the recipient," he says, noting that a Fortune 100 company's general counsel recently told him he's seen an increase in racial comments, failure to listen and other dismissive behaviors among managers and supervisors.
Rather than creating more training, Paskoff says, the response should be more effective training; training that is more in tune with these types of situations. Too often, training is not designed to change underlying behaviors, but is more focused on building legal defenses -- a big mistake in his view.
Training must be focused on "bad behavior," he says, and leaders need to demonstrate proper behavior so that on-the-job role modeling is part of the everyday work culture.
"It requires ongoing reinforcement on the job, which in turn will change behavior and culture," he says. "It should be looked at as a complex assignment for HR. If you want to change behavior and want it to last, the learning has got to matter to the participant; they need to be given simple rules to follow."
Too often, he says, "employers focus on what they have done [to prove] they done something, with little regard about whether it is working or not," he says. "Employers believe, if they do have increased claims, all they need to do is show they have done the training and they can win the case or at least avoid punitive charges.
"But that is not the same thing as preventing the case to begin with," he says. "You need to do things apart from building a defense."
Shanti Atkins, a former employment attorney who is now president and CEO of ELT, an ethics and workplace compliance training firm in San Francisco, agrees.
She says that both the U.S. Supreme Court and EEOC guidelines emphasize that effective compliance programs require both solid antidiscrimination policies as well as effective training.
Policies alone are not enough, she says.
"Financial people think of training as a drain on resources, but HR needs to position this specific training in a dollars-and-cents way, from the bottom-line perspective as well as being the right thing to do," she says. "Some HR people miss the mark or are not thinking to make the business case. But the settlement and damage numbers are out there."
Atkins also says that there are "all kinds of things of nasty things" managers can do that have nothing to do with harassment, but still are a problem. So when you give someone supervisory authority, you need to train them on broader areas related to Title VII.
For example, she says, many training programs do not spend time discussing retaliation.
"Very few managers even understand what retaliation really means," she says. "They don't even understand it is a category apart from other ones."
HR executives should realize, she says, that EEOC job-bias claims are de facto elevated during a recession, so they need to educate their executive team and make the strong business case about why effective policies and periodic training are essential -- not something to be cut.
"For learning in this area to be effective," she says, "employers need to make it part of the fabric of the company culture, not a one-off or reactive-type effort."

description.hltext_display: Egészséges ajándékötletek karácsonyra
description.content:
Egy egyszerű ötletre vágysz, úgy akarsz egy egészséges ajándékot adni, hogy az jelentsen is valamit? Itt a top 10 ötlet, hogy biztos legyen a siker!
+Nagyobb betűméret-Kisebb betűméret
Vicces palack
Nem műanyag palackra gondolunk, sokkal inkább egy termoszra, ami méreganyagoktól mentes, és fémből van. Akár fel is díszítheted, rajzolj rá, vagy írj valami kedveset, speciális tollakkal. Így mindig az ajándékozottnál lehet, ráadásul még a környezetet is kímélitek.
Teljes kiőrlésű bőségtál
Tölts meg egy kosarat egészséges dolgokkal, mint a barnarizs, teljes kiőrlésű tészta, zab, kuszkusz. Tegyél melléjük recepteket, mindez nem csak esztétikus lesz, hanem igen egészséges is.
Csonthéjasok
A csonthéjas magvak omega-3 zsírsavat tartalmaznak, amik jót tesznek a szívnek. Emellett segítenek megelőzni a rákot, javítják a memóriát, és még nem is tartalmaz sok kalóriát!
Gyógynövények
Tegyél magvakat egy cserépbe, amit akár fel is díszíthetsz. Akár a citromfű vagy a menta, mind finomak, és a cserepes megoldás miatt az ajándékozott magának nevelheti fel a csemegeszámba vehető gyógynövényeket!
Uzsonnásdoboz
Ezek a termikus dobozok aranyosan emlékeztetnek az első osztályos évekre, emellett egy személyesnek szánt díszítéssel, felirattal igazán találó lehet. Ráadásul minden étkezésnél az eszébe fogsz jutni az ajándékozottnak!
Vegyes teaválogatás
Mi is lehetne jobb egy hideg téli estén egy pohár forró teánál? Ráadásul rengeteg ízből választhatsz, már maga a csomagolás is feladhatja a problémát – lehet zsákban kapni, dobozban, mindezek mellett ezernyi ízesítésből választhatsz.
Bárhogy is döntesz, egy ilyen antioxidánsokban gazdag ajándékkal nem foghatsz mellé!
Lépésszámláló
Az újabb verziókat már számítógéphez is lehet csatlakoztatni, és a weben versenyezni, hogy ki járta le jobban a lábát. Sportos alkatoknak igazán jó választás, de a lustábbakat is mozgásra bíztathatod ezzel az ajándékkal!
Komposzt-szemetes
Egy kertészkedő rokonnak nagyon jó ajándék lehet, ezek mellett igen környezetvédő megoldás, a választottak egészen biztosan értékelni fogják!
Pároló edény
A gőzölés könnyű és egészséges módja a zöldségek elkészítésének, ezek mellett igen szórakoztató lehet japán recept alapján halat párolni.
Csokoládé
A csoki a legbiztosabb módja a győzelemnek, szerintem szinte mindenki szereti a csokit. Persze a legegészségesebb verzióknak a kakaótartalmuk 70% felett van, így érdemes ilyet választani.

description.hltext_display: Aktien Frankfurt Ausblick: Kaum verändert - Gute Stimmung auch ohne Impulse
Choose the perfect women's watches
description.content: If you cannot make a decision on choosing what kind of watch for your girlfriend or for yourself, you should understand that it is very tricky to choose a right kind of women's watches. Therefore, there are some suggestions for you to consider. They are as follows.First, you have to make it clear what kind of girl she is. Look close at her and then choose one to match her dressing and her personality.Second, try to observe what she has already owned and what taste she has. For example, the clothes she is wearing and the car she is driving can help you to know about her style. If she is wearing very trendy, women's fashion watch will probably let her fell happy. When shopping for women's fashion watches, you should make sure the women's fashion watches should look good, need to be made well, have many good features and functions that make them worth wearing.Third, make sure what her identity is. Is she a clerk, a student or a housewife or in some other positions? This will give you some useful information to choose a right kind of watch. Pay attention to what she has already had. It will help you to select a right one for her. For example, you should not buy a sport watch for a girl who is small in size and introvert in characteristic because it is too large and bulky for her. But the sport watch may be a best gift for an aerobics instructor or an athlete because of his or her work.At last, we may know watches are the important accessories for people in their daily lives. If you want to make it as a gift, buy a perfect watch is necessary to please most the person you are buying for. The choice will be easy after you know who you are buying for.

description.content:
（新加坡）新明日报 (2010-12-22)
早报导读
[名家专评]石之瑜：京借华府之力反台独后遗症

[朝鲜问题]韩成立国家危机管理办公室
（香港电）两名好色中国游客，误坠“3P”女贼陷阱。
前晚，两名中国男游客在香港兰桂坊酒吧，被打扮艳丽的蒙古女子搭讪，两男以为飞来艳福，与艳女饮酒至凌晨，其后3人扶醉往酒店房间，大玩“3P”性游戏。不料，蒙古女趁两汉熟睡后，偷走5000港元现金（1000新币），其中一事主惊醒，上前与女贼发生纠缠，另一男子报警。
警员接报赶到，将女贼拘捕，还在其鞋底起回赃款。不过，警察在逮捕女子过程中，蒙古女恼羞成怒，“飞脚”踢伤一名男警，企图逃跑，在场的其他警员见状，立刻上前合力制服女贼。

description.hltext_display: Félezer szovjet és orosz filmet nézhetünk a neten
description.content:
A Moszfilm stúdió több mint 500 szovjet és orosz filmet, köztük számos remekművet tett elérhetővé honlapján: az alkotások ingyenesen vagy csekély díj fejében megtekinthetők.
+Nagyobb betűméret-Kisebb betűméret
Az oldalon lényegében két "virtuális moziban" folyamatosan futnak a filmek, s a vetítések időpontját közlik a honlapon. Emellett bárki bármikor megnézheti azt a filmet, amelyiket éppen akarja - mindkét szolgáltatás ingyenes.
Egy 400 forintnak megfelelő, csekély, szinte névleges díj fejében pedig a filmek le is tölthetők. A listán megtalálhatók a legnépszerűbb szovjet filmek mellett a világ filmművészetének szovjet és orosz remekei is.
Az illetékesek az Interfax hírügynökségnek elmondták: ez a Moszfilm stúdió válasza a kalózoknak. A dolog törvényes, a kópiák kiváló minőségűek, nagyon sok idegen nyelvű felirattal is elérhető, el lehet olvasni a filmről szóló információkat, lehet megjegyzést is hagyni, és mindehhez még csak nem is szükséges regisztrálni a honlapon.
Noha a szolgáltatás csak hétfőn indult be, máris hatalmas az érdeklődés - erre utal, hogy a honlap elég lassan működik, de ezt mutatják a filmekhez írt bejegyzések és a sok köszönetnyilvánítás is a stúdiónak a "szép újévi ajándékért".
A www.mosfilm.ru lapon felül látható hétfő óta egy vörös sáv a filmek plakátjaival, a jobb szélen pedig Vera Muhina Munkás és kolhozparasztnő című híres szobra, a Moszfilm logójával.
Ez utóbbira kattintva lehet megtekinteni tetszés szerint a "virtuális mozik" műsorát és a teljes filmjegyzéket.
A művek jelentős részét angol, francia és - elvben - német felirattal kínálják, de míg angolul és franciául feliratozott filmet sokat találni, német valójában még nincs.
A feliratozás azért is fontos elem, mert ezeket a filmeket meg lehet ugyan kapni DVD-n, de kizárólag orosz nyelvű szöveggel, felirat nélkül.
Egyedül az egyik moszkvai ócskapiacon működik egy áruda, ahol szinkronizált, illetve feliratos változatban is lehet vásárolni szovjet és orosz filmeket: ezek, noha nyilván kalózkópiák, jó minőségűek.

description.hltext_display: Utah Utes football: Utes know how to win their bowl games
description.author: Dirk Facer, Deseret News
description.content:
LAS VEGAS ?? When it comes to going bowling, nobody is doing it better than the Utah Utes. They enter tonight's game against Boise State with the nation's longest active streak of bowl victories.
"It's very important to us," said Utah coach Kyle Whittingham.
The Utes carry a streak of nine consecutive wins into MAACO Bowl Las Vegas, returning to the place where it all started. They began their run of success with a 17-16 win over Fresno State in the 1999 Las Vegas Bowl. It continued in 2001 with a 10-6 triumph over USC at Sam Boyd Stadium.
The streak, which is tied for the second-longest of all-time behind Florida State's record of 11 from 1985-96, has grown each year since 2003.
It's a source of pride within the program and something Utah fans can reflect upon with great satisfaction.
A look back at the current bowl roll:
1) Utah 17, Fresno State 16 (1999 Las Vegas Bowl):
2) Utah 10, USC 6 (2001 Las Vegas Bowl):
3) Utah 17, Southern Miss 0 (2003 Liberty Bowl):
4) Utah 35, Pittsburgh 7 (2005 Fiesta Bowl):
5) Utah 38, Georgia Tech 10 (2005 Emerald Bowl):
6) Utah 25, Tulsa 13 (2006 Armed Forces Bowl):
7) Utah 35, Navy 32 (2007 Poinsettia Bowl):
8) Utah 31, Alabama 17 (2009 Sugar Bowl):
9) Utah 37, California 27 (2009 Poinsettia Bowl):
e-mail: dirk@desnews.com

description.hltext_display: Aktien Europa Ausblick: Nahezu unverändert
楊淑君案 跆協理事長陳建平最大挑戰
description.content:
中華民國跆拳道協會理事長陳建平，近來因跆拳道選手楊淑君事件，常出現在媒體。陳建平今天說，這是他就任理事長以來最大的挑戰，「近1個月工作量比過去3年還多！」
陳建平出身高雄政治世家，他父親是前高雄市議會議長陳田錨，陳建平也擔任過第2屆立法委員，2007 年當選跆拳道協會理事長。
熱愛運動的陳建平，同時也是大眾商業銀行的董事長，去年又當選中華民國體育運動總會會長，目前還是中國國民黨中央評議委員、中華奧林匹克委員會副主席、高雄市跆拳道委員會主委，一人身兼多職。
身兼那麼多職務，陳建平開自己玩笑說，「因楊淑君事件，近1個月處理跆拳道事務比過去3年還多！」若跟銀行業務相比，他也笑笑地說，總是都會遇到挫折跟挑戰。陳建平強調，還好政府、民眾、媒體一直給他們力量，讓他們走下去。
去年底香港東亞運曾發生中華選手曾敬翔遭南韓選手擊倒的爭議事件，今年又遇到楊淑君事件。
陳建平表示，楊淑君事件比曾敬翔嚴重多了。他說，因為楊淑君被認為有意圖使用非法的設備，「這是最不能承受的。」
過去也練跆拳道的陳建平說，「雖然我沒有參加過大型的比賽，不過，以選手的同理心來看，楊淑君練了那麼久，最後遭到失格的判決，很替她感到委屈。」
陳建平表示，對於楊淑君事件後續，希望世界跆拳道聯盟能「擱置爭議，求同存異」，共同為跆拳道的發展前進。991222

description.hltext_display: 惊人浪费！每百桌酒席 剩菜足饱200人
description.content:
（新加坡）新明日报 (2010-12-22)
早报导读
[名家专评]石之瑜：京借华府之力反台独后遗症
[中国早点]性别比例失衡刺激经济增长

[台海局势]江陈会：明年大陆客游台日增千人
[朝鲜问题]韩成立国家危机管理办公室
（香港讯）从冬至到圣诞到新年假期，香港不少市民都大吃大喝。调查发现，一次100桌的中式酒席，吃剩的食物高达400公斤，足够喂饱200人！
据调查，愈迟上菜的酒席，吃剩的情况愈严重，酒席最后上桌的饭面或甜点，浪费度超过三成。
有团体建议，中式的酒宴应减少主菜数目，以降低厨余量。餐饮业代表说，有两至三成饮宴酒席，已把主菜数目“八变六”，并鼓励以“中式西食”形式上菜，减少浪费。
去年，香港每日的厨余量，多达964吨。

description.hltext_display: Officer Risks Life In Harbour Rescue
description.content:
Officer taken to hospital in hypothermic condition after jumping into freezing water after man...
An officer needed to be treated in hospital after plunging into the icy waters of Bristol Harbourside to rescue a man who had jumped from the quayside.
PC Grant Goulden, serving with Avon and Somerset Police, had to make the snap decision to follow the man into the water after seeing that he was in serious difficulties.
Both the officer and the man were pulled from the harbour by fire and rescue personnel. It has since been confirmed that a man was arrested on suspicion of threatening behaviour in connection with an earlier incident.
A spokesman for the Avon and Somerset Force told PoliceOracle.com that the drama had unfolded when officers were called to the area around 20:15 on Friday evening.
The spokesman stressed: “A member of the public had phoned to say that a man looked as if he had been about to jump, which he did a very short time later.
“When the police arrived, he was struggling in the near-freezing water – officers were advised not to go in after him but PC Goulden decided to take action.”
The spokesman said that the officer had initially tried throwing rubber rings to the man, but he did not take them. He had seemed concerned that a friend may have been in the water, although checks later found this not to be the case.
PC Goulden and the man were pulled from the harbour by the fire and rescue service. The officer was taken to hospital, where his body temperature was found to have dropped to below 30C – considered to be moderate hypothermia – and he was immediately put in a hot tent to warm up.
The police spokesman added: “The actions of this officer saved the man’s life and he acted to place the safety of a member of the public before his own. By the time PC Goulden acted, the man concerned was already going under.”

description.hltext_display: Mit együnk, hogy megőrizzük bélflóránk egészségét?
description.content:
A normál bélflóra jelentős szerepet tölt be immunrendszerünk működésében. Ahhoz, hogy ez a rendszer optimális szinten működjön elengedhetetlen egészségének megőrzése.
+Nagyobb betűméret-Kisebb betűméret
Mit tehet annak érdekében, hogy bélflórája és immunrendszere is tökéletesen működjön?
A bélflóra egészsége kiemelt szerepet játszik
A tápcsatorna egészségmegőrzésének alappillére az egészséges táplálkozás. Napjainkban sokat hallhatunk erről a témáról, azonban sokszor ellentmondásokkal is találkozhatunk.
Természetesen nem általánosíthatunk, egyénre szabottan számos összetevő figyelembevételével kell összeállítani az ideális tápanyagszükségletet! Azonban az általánosságban elmondható, hogy az egészséges táplálkozás nem jelenti egyik élelmiszer tilalmát sem, lényege a mértékletesség.
Étrendünk összeállítása során érdemes előnybe részesíteni a teljes kiőrlésű gabonafélékből készült péktermékeket, zöldségeket, gyümölcsöket, főzelékeket, fehér és sovány húsok fogyasztását, halakat, élőlfórás-natúr joghurtokat.
A legfontosabb szempont, hogy vegyes táplálkozást folytassunk, változatosan étkezzünk, válogassunk a különböző gabonafélék, húsok, zöldségek, gyümölcsök között, ne essünk túlzásokba és ne váljunk a szokások rabjává.
Az egészséges táplálkozás alapszabályai
o Sokszor emlegetett mondat: a „Többször együnk keveset!”
Napi 4-5 alkalommal, kis mennyiségű élelmiszer elfogyasztásával nem terheljük meg egyszerre az emésztőrendszerünket, elősegítjük és megkönnyítjük szervezetünknek ez emésztés folyamatát.
o Az alapanyagok kiválogatása során fektessünk nagy hangsúlyt az élelmi rostokban gazdag nyersanyagok felhasználására. Jótékony hatással vannak az bélrendszer működésére: méregtelenítő funkciójuk mellett segítik az emésztést és táptalajt biztosítanak az egészséges bélflórát alkotó mikroorganizmusok számára.
Főzéshez, sütéshez zsír helyett válasszunk inkább olajat, vagy margarint, de ezekből is csak a szükséges mennyiséget! Bő zsiradékban történő sütés helyett, süssünk sütőzacskóban, fóliában, fólia alatt, zöldségek elkészítésénél részesítsük előnyben a párolást!
o Prebiotikumok, probiotikumok, szinbiotikumok A bélflóra fő funkciója a kórokozókkal szembeni védelem, valamint az immunrendszer állandó készenléti szinten tartása.
Ha a bélflóránk egyensúlya felborul, és a káros baktériumok száma megnő, célszerű probiotikumokat, prebiotikumokat alkamaznunk az egyensúly helyreállítása érdekében.
Kerüljük a túlzott fűszerhasználatot, beleértve a nagy mennyiségű só, csípős fűszerek alkalmazását, továbbá azokat a fűszerféleségeket is mellőzzük, amelyekhez a tápcsatornánk nincs hozzászokva!
Az ételek sűrítéséhez használjuk a liszt teljes kiőrlésű változatát, de kiválóan alkalmas erre a célra a keményítő vagy a zabkorpa használata. Köretként fogyasszunk friss zöldségekből készült salátákat, barna rizst, esetenként a burgonya is megengedett!
o Vacsorára kerüljük az energiadús, magas szénhidrát és fehérje tartalmú élelmiszerek, valamint zsíros ételek fogyasztását! Iktassunk be gyümölcsöt, zöldséget az étrendünkbe, tízóraira, uzsonnára is kiváló választás.
Alacsonyabb fehérjetartalmuk és magasabb rosttartalmuk miatt csökken a tranzitidejük, vagyis kevesebb időt töltenek a tápcsatornában, továbbá jelentős szerepük van a méregtelenítésben, rosttartalmuknál fogva javítják az emésztést, és vízhajtó hatással is bírnak.
o Szervezetünknek nagy szüksége van az ideális folyadékbevitelre. A legjobban akkor döntünk, ha a vizet választjuk folyadékpótlás céljából.
Egy átlagos testsúlyú felnőtt számára az ajánlott napi folyadékfelvétel 1.5-2 liter, melyből többre is szükség lehet például nyáron, vagy sporttevékenységek alkalmával. Figyeljünk oda az elegendő mennyiség bevitelére és ne csak akkor igyunk, ha már szomjúság kínoz bennünket!
Hanyagoljuk a cukros üdítők fogyasztását, de óvakodjunk az édesítőszerrel készült ivólevektől és a 100%-os gyümölcstartalmú, hozzáadott cukor nélküli gyümölcslevektől is.
Ezek fogyasztása is csak mértékkel javasolt!
Immunrendszerünket nemcsak nyirokszervek és nyirokcsomók alkotják, hanem fontos részét képezi az az 1-2 kilogrammnyi hasznos baktériumtömeg is, amely a bélrendszerben, döntően a vastagbél területén helyezkedik el.
A saját sejtjeink számának tízszeresét kitevő baktériumok táplálása és életfeltételeinek biztosítása legalább olyan fontos, mint a saját sejtjeinké. E hasznos baktériumflóra szervezetünk külvilággal érintkező részét – a bélnyálkahártya felszínét – úgy vonja be, mint egy puha szőnyeg.
Ez az – eredetileg – összefüggő védőgát számos hatásra sérülhet.
Az egészségünk érdekében tartsuk be a szabályokat
Megkíméljük magunkat a kellemetlen tünetektől és: a bélflóra egyensúlyának felborulása számos kínzó panasz kialakuláshoz vezet, továbbá az immunrendszer működésében a bélflóra alapvető résztvevő, így annak károsodásával meggyengül az immunrendszerünk is.
Az elfogyasztott táplálék minősége és mennyisége döntően befolyásolja bélflóránk működését és jelentős szerepet játszik emésztőrendszerünk egészségének megőrzésében.
A túlzott szénhidrát fogyasztás esetén a bélrendszerben az erjedési folyamatok lesznek túlsúlyban, savas lebontási termékek képződnek kóros ennyiségben, túlzott gázképződéshez vezet, és a kellemetlen tünetek mellett, mint a puffadás és hasi görcsök, zavarttá válik a tápanyagok hasznosulása is.
A túlzásba vitt fehérje fogyasztással a bélben zajló rothasztási folyamatoknak kedvezünk, melynek következtében a tejsavbaktériumok kiszorulnak és szintén a savas kémhatás felé tolódik az egyensúly. A zsiradékok az epesav képződést fokozva károsítják az bélflórát.
Mit tehetünk, ha a bélflóra egyensúlya felborult?
Ha a tipikus panaszokat észleljük, egészségünk megőrzése érdekében gyors megoldásra van szükségünk, azonban vannak olyan esetek, mint például az antibiotikus kezelések, mikor még a tünetek kialakulása előtt célszerű az úgynevezett probiotikumok használatához folyamodni: jótékony hatású mikroorganizmusok (baktériumok, gombák) szájon keresztül a vastagbélbe kerülve jótékony hatást fejtenek ki és segédkeznek a normál flóra helyreállításában, amely eredményeként a kellemetlen panaszok is megszűnnek!

description.hltext_display: Bull Of The Day: The Cooper Companies (COO)
Gifts ideas
description.content:
Gifts for all of us are pleased. We all like to get a gift, especially one that we want.When you receive a gift from him we get the impression that someone cares about us. Someone remembered the effort that you gave us treats. Indeed praiseworthy gesture.Therefore, if we pleased when we receive the gift, then why scruple and to others around us by surprise. Do not hesitate, do not just wait for an interesting occasion as a birthday, Christmas, Easter and the rest to make people happy. Discover the wishes of your loved ones and make them happy with a gift.
Birthday Gifts
Birthdays are a time when you let everyone that one day a year paid to an end in itself.It's all of us wanted to admit it or not, very special day in the year. We should be celebrating the birthday of the person to give a special birthday gift. If you want to cheer a person who is celebrating her birthday, you should choose something special, possibly what the person mentioned, but are not yet afforded.Birthday gifts should not be anything, a birthday gift should be something special!
Gift for Women
Gifts for women must be something very special. That does not mean it has to be in the form of the Eiffel Tower at a cost, but a gift for a woman to be something they fancy. Before buying consider what your wife is mentioned.When you see something that story, and it can not afford, or even better if it comes to the little things that can not seem to come. description.hltext_display: 中国豪客 涌美扫楼
description.content:
（新加坡）新明日报 (2010-12-22)
早报导读
[名家专评]石之瑜：京借华府之力反台独后遗症

[台海局势]江陈会：明年大陆客游台日增千人
[朝鲜问题]韩成立国家危机管理办公室
（综合讯）美国经济仍无甚起色，中国豪客最近又转战南加州，有豪客在一天之内，竟在洛杉矶一口气买下17幢独立洋房！
在南加州，中国热钱不断涌入房地产市场。当地的华裔产业经纪说，有中国豪客斥巨资，一天之内就在洛杉矶买了17幢独立洋房，作为收租投资之用。
以往，中国富豪在海外置业，多是为了移民或子女教育，如今买入房产，纯粹作投资用途的比例已达三分之一。
据悉，其他国家的地产商及销售代理商，都非常重视中国豪客，甚至移船就?，到中国举行房地产简介会，吸引他们做海外投资。

description.hltext_display: Mondadori-könyvek a Google-könyvtárban
description.content:
Szerződést írt alá az Olaszország egyik legnagyobb kiadójaként ismert Mondadori valamint a Google internetes óriás, amely nemrég indította el elektronikuskönyv-szolgáltatását.
+Nagyobb betűméret-Kisebb betűméret
A felek megállapodása azt jelenti, hogy a lap- és könyvkiadó által megjelentetett könyvek jó része világszerte elérhető lesz elektronikus formában a Google Books, valamint a Google eBooks szolgáltatásban. Ennek hála az olvasók keresgélhetnek és megtalálhatják a Mondadori könyveit a Google világában - emelte ki a két csoport közös közleménye, amelyből az is kiderült, hogy a szolgáltatást 2011-ben indítják útjára.
A Mondadori csoport katalógusában több mint tízezer könyvcím szerepel, ezek közül mintegy 1600 már elérhető e-könyv formájában.
A megállapodás "fontos lehetőség számunkra, hogy széles közönséghez juttathassuk el tartalmainkat és kiadói munkánk termékeit" - fogalmazott Maurizio Costa, a Silvio Berlusconi olasz miniszterelnök Fininvest nevű holdingjába tartozó csoport alelnöke.
Hozzáadom a könyvjelzőhözKüldd ide: DeliciousKüldd ide:

饥渴女袭吻 草食男腿软 网民叹为观止
description.content:
（新加坡）联合晚报 (2010-12-22)
早报导读
[名家专评]石之瑜：京借华府之力反台独后遗症
[中国早点]性别比例失衡刺激经济增长
[时事漫画]韩战机战舰仍处战备状态
[台海局势]江陈会：明年大陆客游台日增千人
[朝鲜问题]韩成立国家危机管理办公室
（吉林讯）吉林科技大学出现一名“饥渴食堂女”，她在人来人往的学校餐厅发挥了肉食女的原始本能，当场将“草食男”压住狂吻N次，就连对方的耳垂与脖子也不放过，拼命咬，令一众网民叹为观止。
影片一开始，“饥渴食堂女”就不断低着头猛吻男友，草食男躺在椅子上被食堂女猛烈地低啄。几秒后，男方像是从水底浮上来一般，从食堂女的身体下方起身；接着女方再吻了男方一次，男方此时突然软掉身子，趴在女友的大腿上。
攻击耳垂 猛吸颈项
只是接下来的画面跟电影《活人生吃》没两样，食堂女又扑上去攻击“草食男友”的耳垂，男方再度败阵疲软“潜水”，食堂女见状继续往下探底，激战将近10秒，直到双方精疲力尽。
恐怖的是，镜头切换后，食堂女走向男友，突一个饿虎扑羊，直攻男友脖子，使出吸血鬼吻法。草食男魂魄都快被吸至干涸，体力不支的他快要虚脱，想要起身走人。
食堂女岂肯放掉嘴中肥肉，手臂环上男友脖子，抓过来又是一阵“吸星大法”。最后只见草食男气力放尽，消失在画面之中。
网友怀疑炒作
这段影片被取名为《吉林科技食堂门事件》，在中国网友之间迅速传开。但是不少网友也质疑，食堂女一度还看着摄影机，会不会又是一次造假炒作。有趣地是，坐在食堂女后方的女大生从头到尾连看都没看一眼，被中国网友夸赞实在有够淡定，也成为食堂门的另类焦点。

description.hltext_display: Utah Utes football: Festivities complete, Utes focus on Broncos
description.author: Dirk Facer, Deseret News
description.content:
LAS VEGAS ? Utah completed the pomp and circumstance portion of MAACO Bowl Las Vegas with a kickoff luncheon at the Las Vegas Convention Center.
Next up: today's football game against Boise State.
"It's like Friday and we're going through our typical Friday routine from this point forward," said Utah coach Kyle Whittingham. "The ability of our players to lock in and focus and keep their minds where they need to be is going to be critical."
Tuesday's gathering featured short remarks by both head coaches, a player from each team and bowl officials. Former NFL player and coach Herm Edwards, who is now with ESPN, was the guest speaker.
"He's a guy I've admired for many years and he did great with his speech. It was a great event," Whittingham said. "He's still got that fire in his belly. I wish he were still coaching but I think he's having a good time doing the TV thing right now."
Edwards directed his remarks to the players and encouraged them to take advantage of their opportunities and honor the names on the back of their jerseys, as well as the front.
Before the inspirational speech, the crowd shared a few laughs. After Utah senior Zane Taylor spoke about writing his talk while his wife ironed his clothes, Boise State coach Chris Petersen offered a funny rebuttal.
"Where we differ is my wife was at the spa and I was ironing my own clothes," Petersen quipped. "You must be newly married."
SEEKING REDEMPTION:
"It would be nice to come out and play the way that we feel we're capable of playing and have a better showing than we did against TCU for sure,' Whittingham said.
IDAHO UTES:
A Boise reporter learned that Whittingham jokingly asked Hyde about which side he was really on.
"He gave the right answer," Whittingham said. "Most definitely."
Whittingham said that Hyde, a true freshman walk-on, has done a great job all year long and is a top-notch kid with high character.
GRACIOUS HOST:
"It's great. We've got a lot of friends on the staff and some kids we know from past recruiting seasons," Hauck said. "So it's great to see them out here. It's always fun to see your friends, especially around the holidays."
The coach is "fired up" to see the game between Utah and Boise State.
"I get to be a fan," Hauck said. "I'm going to tailgate and everything."
Ironically, UNLV is traditionally where the Pac-10 participtes in the bowl practices. With the conference unable to field a qualifying team to this year's game, Utah wound up on campus.
When a reporter asked if that meant the Utes had already moved on to their new league, Whittingham joked that they must have.
"That's good," he said of the practice situation. "I guess that's a good thing."
e-mail: dirk@desnews.com

description.hltext_display: Japan: Regierung rechnet mit schwächerem Wachstum
１１市町村合併後のまちづくりの基本指針となる「長岡市都市計画マスタープラン」を策定＝新潟県長岡市
description.content:
長岡市は、１１月３０日、１１市町村による平成の大合併を経て、今後１０年間のまちづくりの基本指針となる「長岡市都市計画マスタープラン」を策定した。
策定に当たって、市は、２年９カ月の期間をかけて、有識者で構成する専門の策定委員会（委員長：中出文平長岡技術科学大学教授）を設置しながら、１４回に渡る熱心な議論や、市内１７カ所で各２回のワークショップとその後の素案の説明会を開催。延べ約１，４００人の市民参加を得て取りまとめた。
プランでは、都市づくりの将来像を、「コンパクトに 絆でつなぐ まちとまち 長岡」と定め、市町村合併の「共存共栄」の精神のもと、それぞれの地域が個性的に輝き、さらなる魅力を高めあうまちづくりをめざしている。また、(1)都市の活力を生み出し、地域生活を支える「都心地区」及び「地域の中心部」をしっかりと作り上げ、相互を円滑で便利な幹線道路及び公共交通網で結ぶこと。(2)市街地を適正な規模にとどめ、既成市街地を有効に活用する「コンパクトなまちづくり」を進めること。(3)環境への負荷を軽減するとともに、市民が安全に安心して暮らせる生活空間を創ること−の３つをポイントとして掲げている。
その他の特徴的な事項としては、商業系土地利用に関して、市民生活における買い物の実態を分析した上、「近隣型」「地域型」「広域型」の３つの商業集積類型に分類し、各々その規模による適正な立地を規制・誘導する方針を定めたこと、既成市街地内の大規模遊休地の土地利用の転換を促進するための「地区計画の見直し要件」を定めたこと、さらには、市町村合併により広域化した合併地域と都心地区とを円滑に結ぶ「道路・公共交通の整備方針」を盛り込んだことなどがあげられる。

description.hltext_display: Northern Foods gets new approach
description.content:
LONDON (Reuters) - Food manufacturer Northern Foods (Northern Foods PLC) said it received an approach from food tycoon Ranjit Boparan, boosting its shares, although it reiterated support for a planned merger with Ireland's Greencore .
Responding to a report in the Daily Telegraph, Northern Foods, the biggest maker of Christmas puddings, said that Boparan Holdings approached it on December 17 requesting information. However, it has not yet made an offer proposal to the Northern Foods board. Boparan, a supplier of chickens to supermarkets and the company behind the Harry Ramsden chain of fish and chip shops, could be looking to threaten the proposed $790 million (510 million pounds) tie-up between Northern Foods and Greencore announced in November.
Shares in Northern Foods gained 7.4 percent to 65 pence at 8:31 a.m.
(Reporting by Sarah Young; Editing by Matt Scuffham)

（澳洲讯）澳大利亚球坛爆出裸照丑闻，一名17岁少女前天在社交网面簿发布了三名澳式足球员的全裸及半裸照，三人手部都在下体有所动作，照片立即疯传。
少女声称与球员发生性关系后怀孕，但球员及足球联盟不予援手，只想“打发她”，因而决定大报复。但有关球员指她谎话连篇，甚至曾勒索一名球员2万澳元（2万6000新元），志在博出位。
17岁的达西，前天发放了墨尔本澳式足球队圣基尔达三名球员的两张照片：一张是28岁队长里沃尔特全裸站着，身旁是只穿内裤的24岁队友道森；另一张是26岁球员达尔桑托只穿内裤躺在床上。三人手部都放在下体位置。
“要球员一尝名誉扫地滋味”
照片在面簿上疯传，吸引数以千计面簿用户要求与达西成为朋友。
她说：“我只想向他们报复，因为足球联盟那些人不尊重我。我要令他们明白，我并非可以随便打发掉的女孩。”
达西声称，今年较早时她仍是中学生时，与圣基尔达两名球员发生性关系，其中一人令她怀孕。事件闹到澳洲澳式足球联盟（AFL），警方也介入，但调查结论是球员没有“不法行为”，令她深感受辱。达西称10月5日诞下死胎。

description.content:
（新加坡）联合晚报 (2010-12-22)
早报导读
[名家专评]石之瑜：京借华府之力反台独后遗症

[朝鲜问题]韩成立国家危机管理办公室
（河南讯）大脑切去一半还能生存吗？河南8岁男童郑小寒患有“婴儿性偏瘫伴顽固性癫痫”，上月成功切除左脑，仅靠右脑生存的他，目前癫痫情况改善，语言能力也明显较以前好，见人还能喊“阿姨”。
郑小寒是流浪儿，半年前被送往儿童福利院。当时他右腿有些拐，右手没有握力，走路经常摔倒。医生发现他左脑萎缩，决定为他开刀切除左脑。医生说，小寒左脑的功能部份在手术前已转移到右脑，为防止右脑偏移，他们在小寒的左脑注入生理盐水，并以挡板隔开左右脑。手术后病人癫痫控制有效率可达90％以上。

description.hltext_display: Berliner Start-up "6 Wunderkinder” erhält Kapital vom High-Tech Gründerfonds
description.content:
Berliner Start-up “6 Wunderkinder” erhält Kapital vom High-Tech Gründerfonds
Das junge Berliner Unternehmen “6 Wunderkinder” gewinnt den High-Tech Gründerfonds als neuen Investor: Mit dem Kapital in Höhe von 500.000 Euro soll vor allem die technische Entwicklung und Umsetzung der Plattform wunderkit finanziert werden. Der Launch von wunderkit ist für die erste Jahreshälfte 2011 geplant.
wunderkit, eine moderne Arbeits- und Produktivitäts-Plattform soll für Unternehmen, Freelancer und andere Anwender die Möglichkeit bieten, sich untereinander zu vernetzen und effektiv auf einer Plattform zusammen zu arbeiten. Besonderes Augenmerk wird dabei auf ein schönes und effektives Bedienkonzept gelegt. Sebastian Scheerer, User Interface Designer bei 6 Wunderkinder: „Die Ansprüche der User sind inzwischen deutlich gewachsen. Die Menschen wollen Software benutzen, die wirklich schön aussieht und einfach zu bedienen ist. Und Sie wollen produktiver sein.“
wunderlist erreicht 180.000 Downloads
Mit wunderlist, einem schlanken und kostenlosen Aufgabenplaner für Windows, Mac und iPhone, konnten die 6 Wunderkinder bereits zeigen, dass sie in der Lage sind, Software zu entwickeln, die alltägliche Probleme effektiv löst. Innerhalb der ersten sieben Wochen wurde das Programm mehr als 180.000 Mal heruntergeladen und über eine halbe Million Aufgaben wurden angelegt. Bereits fünf Tage nach der Veröffentlichung im Apple AppStore schaffte es wunderlist in Deutschland auf Platz eins der meistgeladenen Apps in der Kategorie „Produktivität“ und auf die Startseite des amerikanischen AppStores. In allen Social-Media-Kanälen haben die “6 Wunderkinder” bereits jetzt zehntausende Fans, die sich regelmäßig über Neuigkeiten des Berliner Unternehmens informieren. Auf der Webseite konnten bereits rund 500.000 Besucher gezählt werden.
Geschäftsführer und Gründer Christian Reber sagt dazu: „Das ist bereits ein beachtlicher Erfolg. Besonders, wenn man bedenkt, dass wunderlist nur ein kleines Programm ist, das zeigen soll, wie Productivity-Software heutzutage aussehen und funktionieren soll. Mit wunderkit werden wir dann ein ganz neues Konzept von Zusammenarbeit und Produktivität vorstellen können. Unser Ziel ist es, zum Launch von wunderkit bereits 250.000 registrierte User zu haben. Bisher sind es mehr als 50.000.“
Die 6 Wunderkinder konnten mit dem High-Tech Gründerfonds einen Seedinvestor für ihr Projekt gewinnen, der das Unternehmen neben der Investition auch im Bereich Know-how und Beratung für das anstehende Projekt unterstützt.
Über die 6 Wunderkinder GmbH
Das Unternehmen wurde im August 2010 in Berlin von sechs Freunden gegründet, die die Leidenschaft für perfektes Interface Design und moderne Web-Apps teilen. Geschäftsführer und Gründer Christian Reber leitet das Unternehmen, das zurzeit zehn Mitarbeiter beschäftigt. Bereits im September investierte ein Business Angel 100.000 Euro in das Unternehmen.
Kontakt
6 Wunderkinder GmbH
Robert Kock
Brunnenstraße 192
10119 Berlin
Tel: +49 30 609889922
Über den High-Tech Gründerfonds
Der High-Tech Gründerfonds investiert Risikokapital in junge, chancenreiche Technologie-Unternehmen, die vielversprechende Forschungsergebnisse unternehmerisch umsetzen. Mit Hilfe der Seedfinanzierung sollen die Start-Ups das F&E-Vorhaben bis zur Bereitstellung eines Prototypen bzw. eines „Proof of Concept“ oder zur Markteinführung führen. Der High-Tech Gründerfonds beteiligt sich an der Seedfinanzierung mit 500.000 Euro und kann in Folgerunden insgesamt bis zu zwei Millionen Euro pro Unternehmen investieren. Investoren des Public-Private-Partnerships sind das Bundesministerium für Wirtschaft und Technologie, die KfW Bankengruppe sowie die sechs Industriekonzerne BASF, Deutsche Telekom, Siemens, Robert Bosch, Daimler und Carl Zeiss. Der High-Tech Gründerfonds verfügt insgesamt über ein Fondsvolumen von rund 272 Mio. Euro.
Kontakt:
High-Tech Gründerfonds Management GmbH

description.hltext_display: 電動スクーターを導入＝三重県桑名市
The bottom line: Incentives make sense
description.author: BURLEY MITCHELL AND PRESS MILLEN
description.content:
RALEIGH -- The great newspaper sage, H.L. Mencken, once quipped that there is a "solution to every human problem - neat, plausible, and wrong." To the long list of illustrative examples of Mencken's aphorism we can now add another: North Carolina's budget shortfall is exacerbated by economic incentives.
The arithmetic is certainly neat and plausible: The state faces a budget shortfall of over $3 billion. In recent years, companies have been granted millions in state economic incentives to construct new facilities and create new jobs in North Carolina. If that had never happened - or if it stopped happening - voila!: a smaller deficit.
The problem with that simple solution, neat and plausible as it may be, is that it's just wrong, and for four basic reasons. 1. You can't tax what's not here . Most fundamentally, the anti-incentives crowd refuses to recognize this reality. If a company builds a new major Internet data center in North Carolina, it can get some tax exemptions. State law defines such a facility as one costing at least $250 million. Given the way the law works, the state will forgo some tax revenue as a result of the exemptions granted.
That's not the end of the inquiry, however. If that data center doesn't get built, the property probably remains a fallow field generating minimal taxes and no jobs. A data center located in South Carolina - or India - won't generate any tax revenue for North Carolina either. The issue, in other words, is not a fully-taxed facility versus one which receives some incentives. The issue is between a partially taxed facility and no facility at all.
2. Updating the tax laws to reflect 21st century realities is not the same thing as giving away state funds. Preferential tax treatment for businesses in North Carolina is not a new phenomenon. In fact, tax exemptions and credits are strewn throughout the state's tax laws and many date back a hundred years or more. We count over 60 tax exemptions for various industries ranging from manufacturing to agriculture to forestry.
Incentives, at bottom, simply recognize the existence of new industries and put them on equal footing with older, more established industries.
To go back to the data center example, most the state's so-called incentives simply put taxes on electricity and capital investment for this new industry at the same rates as manufacturing. The choice is stark: should North Carolina be known as the state with tax laws favorable to the industries of yore (like textiles) or the state that treats industries - old and emerging - equally?
3. It ignores how economic growth works . The Research Triangle Park provides a salient example. Fifty years ago, the land that comprises RTP was largely undeveloped pine forest generating little tax revenue or jobs. Companies locating in RTP received various tax advantages and today it's known the world over as a model for economic development.
Does anyone doubt that RTP has made the economy of our region stronger or that it has improved our quality of life?
An entirely different model, Fort Bragg - an untaxed 250 square miles - is an unparalleled economic engine for Fayetteville and its surrounding counties. In each case, the issue is not the taxes paid - or forborne - by the entity itself, but instead the economic momentum that they provide.
4. It ignores history. Opponents of incentives love to hearken back to an age when mighty industrialists created great companies from the sweat of their own brow with, at best, the benign neglect of government. That history, sadly, never existed.
In 1796, after two terms as president, George Washington delivered his famed farewell address to the people of the United States. In that address, Washington laid out his views on the role of government in commerce. Government, Washington said, should play the role of "diffusing and diversifying by gentle means the streams of commerce" and of "establishing . . . to give trade a stable course . . . and to enable the government to support them." Ever the pragmatist, Washington called for continual re-examination of policies "as experience and circumstances shall dictate."
In the arena of economic development, government can play only two roles: a positive role seeking to attract businesses and build up commerce or a negative role driving businesses and jobs away. The putative "neutral" role that some incentives opponents purport to advocate really just means passive negativity. It amounts to the government telling businesses (and their workers) that "we don't care if you go to some other state."

description.hltext_display: Adobe plant Einkaufstour
Piden posada en el Chapultepec
description.author: Gabriela Camacho
description.content:
El personal del colegio se reúne para estechar sus lazos amistosos
Gabriela Camacho
Las damas entonan melodías mientras encienden las velas para pedir posada.
Fotografía: Noroeste/Cutzi Salgado.
< anterior
< anterior
siguiente >
CULIACÁN._El personal del Colegio Chapultepec celebró su posada navideña, que inició con un rosario que se ofreció con motivo a la futura llegada del Niño Dios.
Con un tema alusivo a estas fechas y con velas encendidas que representan la fe de cada una de las damas que asistieron, dejaron entrar al Salvador a la casa de las chapulinas.
Organizan la celebración
La directora del plantel, Lourdes Galindo de Castro, quien se encargó de los preparativos de la amena tarde, dio la bienvenida a las asistentes deseándoles felices fiestas en compañía de sus seres queridos, ya que es momento de compartir y de dar amor.
Disfrutan en encuentro
Las invitadas festejaron la futura llegada de Dios en sus corazones y disfrutaron una rica cena consistente en tacos de guisos, además rompieron piñata y pasaron una noche agradable en compañía de la familia Chapultepec.

description.hltext_display: BT folgt seinen Kunden nach Asien
Utah Utes basketball: A tough task in battle with Bulldogs
description.author: Mike Sorensen, Deseret News
description.content:
HONOLULU ? Utah may have the better record, but the 7-3 Utes won't be favored when they take on 6-4 Butler tonight in the first round of the Diamond Head Classic at the Stan Sheriff Center (9 p.m. MST, EPSNU).
After their run to the NCAA Finals in April, the Bulldogs became known around the country for their team-oriented, tough-minded play as they came within a whisker of winning the whole thing when Gordon Hayward's halfcourt shot bounced off the iron at the final buzzer against Duke.
This year, Butler is off to a similar start to last year's slow start with three losses to ranked teams. However, the Bulldogs are coming off their best game of the season, an 83-50 thrashing of Stanford on Saturday.
"The thing that strikes me the most about this team is their strength and toughness and the way they play as a team," said Utah coach Jim Boylen. "Their pieces fit well and they're a veteran team who's been through some battles together."
Fans who watched the Bulldogs in their magical run to the Final Four, which included a pair of upset wins in Salt Lake City, will remember several players from last year's team.
Three starters are back, including forward Matt Howard, guard Shelvin Mack and guard Ronald Nored.
Howard has taken over for departed Hayward, who decided to turn pro after last year's outstanding sophomore season and ended up with the Utah Jazz.
"Thank goodness he's in Utah," Boylen said about Hayward. But the Utes have plenty to be worried about with Howard, whose numbers are surpassing Hayward's of last year.
Howard leads the Bulldogs in both scoring (17.9 ppg) and rebounding (8.1 rpg) and has been on a tear the past few games. In Butler's last three games, he is shooting 63.6 percent from the field (21-of-33) and 96 percent from the foul line (24-of-25). He is also shooting 56 percent from 3-point range on the year and has made his last eight treys.
Mack, a 6-foot-3, 215-pound guard, is averaging just under 15 points a game, while Nored struggled in the early going, but has averaged seven points the past three games.
The Utes are feeling pretty good about themselves, coming into the game with a 7-3 record and a gutsy come-from-behind win over Boise State last Friday night.
Will Clyburn has been the Utes' top player all season and leads the team in scoring (19.5 ppg), rebounding (8.6 rpg) and steals (1.9 spg). Chris Hines is coming off a career-high 13 points against Boise State, while forward Shawn Glover is coming off his best game of the year with 12 points and nine rebounds against Boise.

event_or_fact.property: The thing that strikes me the most about this team is their strength and toughness and the way they play as a team; Their pieces fit well and they're a veteran team who's been through some battles together.

description.hltext_display: Русская православная церковь выходит на финансовые рынки
description.content:
РПЦ создает эндаумент-фонд. Первые деньги в фонде уже есть - это 50 млн, пожертвованные бизнесменом Вадимом Якуниным. Церковники уверены, что им удастся привлечь и других бизнесменов - тех, кто сейчас входит в "золотую сотню" Forbes.
Процесс создания первого в истории Русской православной церкви эндаумента завершится в феврале 2011 года, пишет GZT.RU. Эндаумент-фонд будет создан на базе «Благотворительного фонда имени святителя Григория Богослова». В отличие от благотворительных, эндаумент-фонды могут расходовать пожертвованные средства только на нужды той организации, для поддержки которой они были созданы. А вот инвестировать эти деньги можно куда угодно. 50 млн долларов, полученные от господина Якунина, клирики вложили в консервативные финансовые инструменты»: депозиты банка «Пересвет» и ряд ведущих госбанков.
По словам одного из инициаторов создания фонда Леонида Севастьянова, входящего в Совет директоров ОАО "ПРОТЕК" (компании, владелец которой - Вадим Якунин - стал первым благодетелем фонда), от своих вложений церковь уже получила прибыль 10% годовых - это примерно 5 млн долларов. Севастьянов обещает, что в будущем, когда эндаумент-фонд полностью заработает, церковь диверсифицирует свой портфель и вложит деньги еще куда-нибудь - например, в недвижимость.
К 2011 году создатели фонда вместе с поддерживающим их начинания митрополитом Илларионом собираются полностью перестроить всю церковную экономику. Сегодня церковь, по выражению Севастьяновап, попрошайка, она зависит от своих жертвователей, которые финансируют отдельные проекты. В недалеком будущем РПЦ сможет сама решать, куда направить пожертвованные суммы и куда их вложить. Немало поспособствует финансовой независимости церкви и закон, принятый в ноябре Госдумой - о возвращении церкви имущества религиозного назначения, оказавшегося в руках федеральной и муниципальной власти.

description.hltext_display: Flights resume at Dublin Airport
description.content:
Categories: Tourism, Irish Economy, Travel
Tags: Dublin, Gatwick Airport ,
Share:
Related Articles
Just after seven o’clock this morning, the Dublin Airport Authority advised that flight operations had resumed.
Following the clearance of snow and ice from the main runway, the airport is now open. However, travellers are still asked to check with their airlines before making their way to the airport.
Further updates can be found at: http://twitter.com/dublinairport
Some knock-on effects will also be seen from the number of cancelled flights already seen, as well as continuing problems in the UK and Europe. A spokeswoman for the DAA told the Irish Times that there is a “logistical challenge” due to the 230 disrupted flights yesterday.
Shannon, Cork, Knock and both Belfast airports are operating as normal today.
Gatwick Airport has resumed operations in London, while Heathrow is running a reduced flight schedule.
On the roads, most Bus Eireann and Dublin Bus services are running but some curtailments and diversions are in place. Customers are asked to check websites. www.dublinbus.ie and www.buseireann.ie
The Luas green and red lines are operating as normal.

description.hltext_display: Prepara su ajuar Dolly Izábal Torres
description.author: Gabriela Camacho
description.content:
Dolly Izábal Torres celebra su futuro matrimonio con Carlos Ochoa Trizón
Dolly Izábal Torres
Fotografía: Noroeste/Ramón Cárdenas.
< anterior
< anterior
siguiente >
CULIACÁN._Ocho años de un hermoso noviazgo, en los que la comprensión, el cariño y amor lograron el objetivo de unir dos vidas en una sola, las de Dolly Izábal Torres y Carlos Ochoa Trizón, quienes a partir del 8 de enero serán esposos.
Las anfitrionas
Karla y Diana Izábal, Sandra Trizón, Sabina de Izábal, Carmen de Valencia, Conchis de Cuevas, Dolly de Izábal y Julieta Hernández fueron las anfitrionas de la velada que se ofreció para 170 personas.
La mamá de la novia, Sabina de Izábal; y suegra, Sandra Trizón, la llenaron de bendiciones y le brindaron su apoyo incondicional por el inicio de una nueva etapa al lado de Carlos.
Durante la convivencia, la festejada compartió que su enlace se realizará a las 20:00 horas, en el templo de Santa Inés, mientras que la recepción, en la hacienda Las Ilusiones.
VESTIDO
Dolly viajó a Guadalajara para adquirir su vestido de novia.
DECORACIÓN
La decoración de la fiesta solteril fue en tono rojo, así como las flores que adornaron los centros de mesas, a cargo de Luz María y Beatriz Leal.
RECUERDO
Las invitadas recibieron pulseras de perlas como recuerdo del prenupcial.

description.hltext_display: Парадоксы индустрии туризма: итоги 2010 года
description.content:
Несмотря на то, что 2010 год был нелегким для туризма, тенденции сегодня скорее положительные, чем отрицательные. В мировом масштабе туризм начал выходить из кризиса.
Характерные особенности посткризисного туризма проявляются в том, что туристы, например, в Европе, стали путешествовать на более короткие расстояния и на меньшее время. По данным Всемирной организации по туризму положительная тенденция проявилась уже в первой половине 2010 года.
Что касается российского туризма, то здесь ситуация тоже начала выравниваться: по статистике Ростуризма и Росстата, количество туристов, хоть и медленно, но увеличивается. К сожалению, вторая половина 2010 года, в частности октябрь и ноябрь, была достаточно драматичной для российского туризма. Это связано, прежде всего, с несостоятельностью одного из крупнейших туроператоров России, компании «Капитал-тур», которая в ноябре объявила о неспособности выполнять свои обязательства, и несколько тысяч туристов оказались без возможности воспользоваться теми услугами, которые они купили в «Капитал-туре». В связи с этим возникли проблемы и у турагентов. «Капитал-тур» имеет финансовые гарантии на сумму 100 миллионов рублей, которые, к сожалению, не покроют те обязательства, которые туроператор имеет перед туристами. Естественно, турист пойдет к турагентам, которые должны будут за свой счет решать эти финансовые проблемы.
Если говорить о развитии внутреннего туризма, то он сейчас провозглашен как одна из наиболее важных перспектив развития российского туризма. В соответствии с концепцией Министерства спорта, туризма и молодежной политики РФ, принятой в июле 2010 года, сейчас разрабатывается программа развития внутреннего и въездного туризма.
Те регионы, которые планируют развитие туризма, должны будут разработать и разрабатывают региональные программы. Без этих программ они не могут быть вовлечены в общую федеральную программу развития внутреннего и въездного туризма, поэтому для развития российского туризма это положительный фактор. Это то, чего долго ждал российский туризм. Будем надеяться, что программа все-таки будет принята.
Такие документы, как концепция развития внутреннего и въездного туризма чрезвычайно важны. В рамках этого проекта предусматривается финансирование и со стороны государства, и государственно-частного партнерства, и, естественно, большой стимул для развития туризма — это достаточно успешное строительство олимпийских объектов. Проблемами, с точки зрения конкурентоспособности российского туризма, конечно, остаются развитие инфраструктуры, дороговизна перемещения по России, но перспективы для развития есть.
Что касается выездного туризма, то в этом году он был дополнительно стимулирован той ситуацией, которая сложилась в европейской части России, когда пожары, к несчастью случившиеся в нашей стране, вынудили многих наших граждан покинуть горящие регионы. Кстати, это способствовало развитию еще и внутреннего туризма.
Туризм — живой организм, на который влияют множество факторов. Так, приближающиеся новогодние праздники многие российские туристы собираются встречать за рубежом, но, например, события в Египте опять сократили объемы выездного туризма.
Будем надеяться, что перспективы развития российского туризма достаточно хороши, и это связано с тем, что государство сейчас достаточно много внимания уделяет развитию внутреннего и въездного туризма. Конечно, прежде всего, нужно воспитывать у наших граждан понимание того, что Россия действительно обладает огромными туристскими ресурсами, она находится на пятом месте в мире по наличию туристских ресурсов. Надо и в школах, и в университетах рассказывать о богатствах нашей страны, нужно говорить о том, что Россия — это страна, в которой туризм может развиваться и очень даже успешно. Те страны, которые занимают достаточно активную позицию по продвижению туризма внутри своей страны, добиваются больших успехов. Я думаю, что перспективы развития внутреннего и въездного туризма зависят от нас самих, и от той инфраструктуры, которая должна быть развита. Если посмотреть по разбросанности и наличию туристских ресурсов, естественно, они есть на территории всей России, но те граждане России, которые проживают на европейской части, зная о таких богатых туристских ресурсах как Алтай, Байкал, Камчатка, просто не имеют материальной возможности купить билет, который, как правило, стоит десятки тысяч рублей. Дешевле улететь в Турцию, Египет, нежели путешествовать по России. Здесь должна быть еще очень серьезная позиция государства по снижению расходов на транспорт, например, для определенных категорий граждан как это делается для дальневосточного региона. Транспортные расходы — это основной камень преткновения, который не позволяет активно развиваться внутреннему туризму.
Большим плюсом является то, что, несмотря на кризис, начала восстанавливаться инфраструктура туризма с точки зрения строительства гостиничных объектов. Предприниматели поняли, что туризм — та сфера, которая может и будет приносить доход. Также начинает развиваться технология государственно-частного партнерства. Для туризма это очень важный фактор, поскольку инвестор, конечно, не будет вкладывать деньги в туристскую инфраструктуру, если не подготовлена так называемая общая инфраструктура — дороги, аэропорты, газо- и водоснабжение. И здесь большая роль государства в создании условий для инвестирования в развитие туристской инфраструктуры.

description.hltext_display: Aktien Frankfurt Eröffnung: Kaum verändert - ohne Impulse - Stimmung gut
发改委发布限价令后部分限价药从药店消失
description.content:
来源：中广网┊2926字节┊阅读：45次┊2010-12-22
据中国之声《新闻纵横》报道，从12月12日开始，国家发改委发布《关于降低头孢曲松等部分药品最高零售价格的通知》（以下简称《通知》），一些单独定价药品的最高零售价大幅降低。国家发改委此举是为了让老百姓能买到便宜药。然而，降价令实施一周以来，
记者发现了一个怪现象，相当一部分限价药从药店消失了。
据了解，本次药价调整是发改委自1997年以来进行的第26次降价，其中大部分属于抗生素、心脑血管用药，平均降幅达19%。以辉瑞公司生产的阿奇霉素为例，《通知》中给出的最高零售限价为72.3元，记者昨天（21日）从天津中景堂大药店尖山路店和南楼大药房看到，售价分别为68.5元和67.8元，也就是说，在12月12日《通知》执行以后，消费者再购买阿奇霉素，每盒将省去十几元，降幅超过15%。
本次限价令尽管涉及174个品种规格单独定价药品，但据了解，就算是本市的大型药店平日经营所涉及的品类最多不过30种。记者随机调查了多家药店，很难找到新通知中部分限价药品的身影。
在河西区黑牛城道的一家药房内，记者发现柜台上的阿莫西林、阿奇霉素等药物都是不属于限价之列的厂商所生产的。在附近的另一家大药房，当记者以顾客身份要求购买辉瑞的阿奇霉素时，售货员说已经缺货好几天了。
记者：麻烦您下，咱药店有阿奇霉素吗？辉瑞的。治鼻窦炎的药。
售货员：没有。
记者：我跑了几家了，都说没有，从什么时候没有的？
售货员：有几天了，我们现在缺货，现在没有货。
记者：那什么时候能进货？
售货员：这种进口药价格比较高，平时销量比较少，要等很久。你看看这个药，国产的这个药，也挺管用的，价格还便宜。
在南开区万德庄大街上的几家药店，记者遇到了相同的情况，当记者提出要买昆明某药厂生产的阿莫西林胶囊时，这位售货员递给的药品产地却来自哈尔滨和石家庄。
记者：阿莫西林胶囊有吗？
售货员：有。
记者： 这不是昆明生产的。
售货员：你说的那个没有，只有这个，功效是一样的。
记者：昆明那个不是限价吗，便宜啊。你们怎么不卖了？是没利润吗？
售货员：你说的那药限价了，利润没了怎么卖？现在不好做了。
在采访中，一些销售人员向记者抱怨说，虽然说国家规定药品限零售价，但药店的进价没有降低，那就只能卖不降价的药，才能保证利润。为什么这么多限价药品销声匿迹？经营药品多年的业内人士李先生向记者道出了玄机。
李先生：首先，这次限价药品大多是处方药品，一般患者在医院的药房就购药了，因此很多药店平时就减少处方药品的进货量。其次，一部分药品的药店进价高于新公布的最高零售限价，为避免亏损，部分药店将所涉及的药品进行了下架处理，将来是为了退给厂家，减少或者不受损失。
药品限定的价格是有关部门听取了各方意见、经过严格谁之后才作出的，但药店却反映厂家不肯降价，所以卖降价药无利可图。是政府限价限得不合理，还是药店没有说出真相？
前不久，有记者在哈尔滨市场上发现麻杏止咳片也在限价之后失踪了。一种0.26克*24片装的，限价前是每盒8.6元，限价后是3.4元，但记者以购货者身份询问厂家，厂家却给出了1.6元的批发价。也就是说，5.3倍的利润他们还卖，1倍的利润他们就嫌低了。
记者的调查还发现，有些药被限价了，消失了，但又会改头换面，比如原来是片剂的，可能会以胶囊、颗粒的形式出现，目的就是区别于被国家限制价格的产品。当然，剂型的改变，需要国家药监局审批。所以，简单的“限价”并不能一劳永逸地解决药价高问题，要解决药价高，除了限价，还要严格审批“新药品”，完善国家药品注册制度，不给药品“死去活来”的机会。
（中华传媒网）

description.hltext_display: Rogers 'gripped by terror' on boat ride
description.content:
Dual international Mat Rogers was "gripped by terror" as a Gold Coast boat cruise with former rugby league teammates and friends almost ended in tragedy at the weekend.
Rogers was one of 10 people, including two children, on a 10-metre boat with former Titans teammate Greg Bird, TV personality Matt Johns and international cyclist Robbie McEwen, when passengers began losing consciousness after inhaling toxic carbon monoxide fumes.
The passengers were inhaling the undetectable gas from exhaust fumes building up in the boat and six of the nine on board, including Johns and Bird, collapsed.
He and McEwen are being hailed as heroes after rescuing a passenger who fell overboard during the drama.
"There was a time on the boat I felt terrified and powerless to do anything," the recently retired rugby league star told AAP on Wednesday.
"I was pretty messed up for a time. I slipped off my chair and ended up on the ground but I don't think I lost complete consciousness.
"It was frightening.
"I was standing there thinking `what's happening, what's happening', it was like something out of a movie.
"I remember I had my phone in my hand and I was looking at it wondering what I was going to do with it, I couldn't even make a phone call."
Despite his confused state, Rogers leapt into the water to help a man who'd fallen off the back of the boat after blacking out just off Sanctuary Cove.
He and McEwen, whose high altitude training and superior oxygen levels helped him cope with the situation better than other passengers, kept the unconscious passenger's head above water until help arrived.
"I saw the man walk around to the back of the boat and pass out and fall into the water," recalled the 34-year-old Rogers.
"I think I was probably the only one who saw him fall overboard. I was just coming to my senses and jumped in, which was probably a silly thing to do.
"I ran through the boat and just dived in. Robbie (McEwen) tried to stop me because he knew I wasn't any good and then he dived in after me.
"I just grabbed the guy and laid back in the water and waited for the boat to come back around and get us."
The scary experience left Rogers more exhausted than in any of the 100 representative games he played during his career.
"I was that spent. I had no oxygen left in my system after I'd jumped in with Robbie to get this guy, I couldn't get back in the boat," he said.
"Luckily Birdie (Greg Bird) realised how serious it was and he just grabbed me and pulled me into the boat.
"I'm glad Birdie was there, he's a big fella and I was really struggling."
The drama started on the slow trip back from McLarens Landing when passengers began to lose consciousness.
The plastic panels on the side of the boat, lowered to protect passengers from a storm, had created a vacuum that sucked the killer fumes back into the boat.
"We were breathing it in, totally oblivious to it, we couldn't smell it," said Rogers.
"It was nobody's fault, it was just one of those freak things."

event_or_fact.property: I had no oxygen left in my system after I'd jumped in with Robbie to get this guy, I couldn't get back in the boat
We were breathing it in, totally oblivious to it, we couldn't smell it

description.hltext_display: Utah Utes, Broncos plenty motivated for epic bout
description.author: Dirk Facer, Deseret News
description.content:
LAS VEGAS ? Perhaps it's only fitting that Boise State and Utah square off in MAACO Bowl Las Vegas.
If the original and most successful Bowl Championship Series busters can't tangle on a stage as grand as the Fiesta, Orange, Rose or Sugar bowls, the city that has hosted so many main events over the years may be just the venue.
Although the 10th-ranked Broncos (11-1) are the well-established favorites to deliver a knockout, the 19th-ranked Utes (10-2) are dangerous underdogs in bowl situations. Just ask Alabama.
Considering the recent histories of both programs, the so-called "Battle of the BCS Busters" has all the makings of an intriguing bout. Both head coaches ? Boise State's Chris Petersen and Utah's Kyle Whittingham ? have acknowledged such. Each has noted that their teams will have their hands full.
All the talk will stop, however, when the game kicks off this evening at Sam Boyd Stadium.
Ding. Ding.
That's when the only non-automatic qualifying programs to win two BCS games ? let alone one ? will clash for the first time since accomplishing such tasks.
And though it lacks the punch of a BCS game, there is still a lot on the line.
"It would be huge," Whittingham said when asked about the potential impact of a victory over the Broncos. "I think there's a lot of upside if we're able to come away with a win."
For starters, Utah is seeking its 10th consecutive bowl victory ? the longest active run of success in the nation and tied for the second-best in history.
A triumph would also give the Utes their 11th win of the season, a milestone only accomplished by the undefeated teams of 2004 and 2008.
Then there's the redemption factor. A victory over highly touted Boise State could ease the sting of a 47-7 loss at home to a comparable TCU team.
The Utes, thus, have plenty to play for and they know it.
Senior captain Zane Taylor acknowledged preparation is ongoing and that "the hay is never in the barn." They'll keep working to get ready.
"It's a constant thing with preparation. We are nowhere near preparing because we prepare up to the kickoff of the game," Taylor said. "But we are right where we need to be. We are getting ready the way we need to. We are going to be ready to show up and play a great football game."
And that, he added, is why the Utes traveled to Las Vegas in the first place.
"Ultimately we're here to play a football game," Taylor said. "And it's a very big and important football game against a great team."

Ultimately we're here to play a football game; And it's a very big and important football game against a great team.

It's a constant thing with preparation.; We are nowhere near preparing because we prepare up to the kickoff of the game; But we are right where we need to be. We are getting ready the way we need to. We are going to be ready to show up and play a great fo
It would be huge; I think there's a lot of upside if we're able to come away with a win.
preparation is ongoing and that "the hay is never in the barn.

Se vestirá Adriana Chucuán de novia
description.author: Guillermo Orrante
description.content:
Adriana Chucuán convive en su despedida de soltera
Guillermo Orrante
Adriana Chucuán convive en su despedida de soltera
Adriana Chucuán Salomón
Fotografía: Noroeste/Ramón Cárdenas.
< anterior
< anterior
siguiente >
CULIACÁN._Feliz se encuentra Adriana Chucuán Salomón por su futuro enlace matrimonial con Luis Gonzalo Mata Tamayo, que se llevará a cabo el 15 de enero, en el templo de Santa Inés, a las 16:00 horas.
Mientras la espera continúa, su mamá, Esther Alicia Salomón de Chucuán; y suegra, Marisela Tamayo de Mata, organizaron una despedida de soltera en el restaurante Cayenna para la novia.
Elvira Ramos de Ureta, Hilda Salazar de Valenzuela, Luz Aída y Susana Salomón Rojo, Minerva Salomón de Garibay, Carolina Garibay de García, María Luz Rojo de Pinto, Blanca Serrano de Mata, Marcela Tamayo de Morachis, Dina Larrondo de Arce, Lucy Jiménez de Duarte, María de la Paz Viedas de Soto y Guty Sandoval Arellano, también participaron como anfitrionas.
Las damas que acompañaron a la futura señora de Mata fueron Margarita Agraz, Wendy Traslaviña, Sofía Castillo, Vanesa Rubio, Romina Vega, Cristina María Beltrán, Claudia Carrillo, Marcela Amarillas, Melissa Palazuelos, Lety Cano, Karla De la Herrán, Annie de Bernal, Luisa Doig, Anabel Amarante, Carolina Cantú, Carmen Gárate, Yamel Sánchez y Verónica Palazuelos.
RECUERDO
Como muestra de agradecimiento cada una recibió un gel antibacterial.
BENDICIÓN
El presbítero Raúl Aguirre los bendecirá.

تغذیه > نوشیدنی‌ها - همشهری آنلاین:
یک فوق تخصص تغذیه گفت: مصرف چای داغ زمینه را برای ابتلا به سرطان مری فراهم می‌کند.
دکتر کیومرث دانشور در گفت وگو با ایسنا، اظهار داشت: مصرف چای داغ در افرادی که مستعد هستند، می‌تواند موجب ابتلا به سرطان مری شود.
وی اظهار کرد: در مناطق غربی کشور مردم مایل هستند چای پر رنگ مصرف کنند که با این کار مقادیر بالایی تئین که مشابه کافئین است را وارد بدن خود کرده که بازتاب آن در ایجاد ضعف اعصاب در اشخاص مستعد مشهود است.
وی گفت: همچنین تئین بالا می‌تواند فرد را دچار اختلال بی‌خوابی کرده و مشکلات عدیده‌ای را در این افراد بوجود آورد.
دکتر دانشور افزود: ماده تئین همچنین می‌تواند فعالیت آنزیمهای هضم را دچار اختلال کند.
این متخصص تغذیه در پایان تاکید کرد: بهتر است چای حتما با آب لیمو مصرف شود تا از این طریق فعالیت و نقش تئین کاهش یابد. با این روش هر کس می‌تواند روزانه تا 4 لیوان چای مصرف کند و از مزایای آن برخوردار شود، همچنین اکیدا توصیه می‌شود که از مصرف چای داغ اجتناب شود.

description.hltext_display: 统计局：部分地区贫困人口比例增加 西部增至66%
description.content:
来源：新华网┊1384字节┊阅读：45次┊2010-12-22
记者从21日召开的全国扶贫工作会议获悉，本世纪头十年，我国农村贫困人口显著减少，贫困发生率明显下降。但受自然灾害严重威胁、发展不平衡等因素影响，未来十年扶贫开发任务艰巨，返贫压力仍然较大。
国务院扶贫开发领导小组办公室主任范小建表示，《中国农村扶贫开发纲要(2001-2010年)》实施10年来，我国扶贫开发取得显著成就。农村贫困人口从2000年底的9423万减少到2009年的3597万，贫困发生率从10.2%下降到3.8%；重点县农民人均纯收入明显增加；贫困地区基础设施社会事业全面加强。
其中，重点县新增基本农田、新建及改扩建公路里程、新增教育卫生用房大幅增加，安全饮用水农户比重、通公路、通电、通电话、通广播电视自然村比例显著提高，县域经济较快发展。
范小建表示，目前，我国贫困人口规模依然庞大，受自然灾害异常严重、农产品市场异常波动、外部环境异常复杂等因素影响，返贫压力仍然较大。未来十年，我国扶贫开发任务十分艰巨。
其中，发展严重不平衡导致连片特困地区矛盾更加突出。据国家统计局贫困监测数据，2001年至2009年，西部地区贫困人口比例从61%增加到66%，民族地区八省从34%增加到40.4%，贵州、云南、甘肃从29%增加到41%。
同时，自然灾害严重，防灾抗灾能力不足也是我国扶贫开发面临的重要问题。据统计，贫困地区遭受严重自然灾害的几率是其他地区的五倍。防灾抗灾能力不足导致许多生态环境脆弱区经济社会发展滞后，农牧业生产受灾害威胁十分严重。
范小建强调，要把基本消除绝对贫困现象作为首要任务，集中连片特殊困难地区作为主战场，进一步加大扶贫开发投入、启动连片特困地区综合治理试点、大力拓展社会扶贫领域、完善扶贫工作机制。
（中华传媒网）

description.hltext_display: Gulfsands sells US assets
description.author: Josh Lewis
description.content:
London-listed Gulfsands Petroleum said it had sold its interest in three producing fields in the shallow water shelf area of the Gulf of Mexico for $4.2 million, as it looks to rationalise its US oil & gas portfolio.The company said the sale included its working interest in Eugene Island 57/58 gas field, as well as the Vermillion 379 and South Pelto 13 oil and gas fields.
Gulfsands said the assets were considered non-core due to either their production being dominated by natural gas or their relatively low working interest positions.
The company will also be returned about $5.6 million in cash deposits that had been held in escrow as security against future reliabilities related to decommissioning work on the licences.
Gulfsands said the transaction had an effective date of 1 May and expected the deal to be completed by the end of next month.

description.hltext_display: Reliable registration is key to voting
description.author: JOHN TANNER
description.content:
WASHINGTON -- Buckle your seat belts. The Voter ID circus is coming to North Carolina. Charges of voter fraud and vote suppression will fly fast and furious. Expect much shouting and name-calling, but expect no one to address the root issue - our outdated voter registration system.
There are two separate but interrelated problems. First, hundreds of thousands of citizens who live, work and pay taxes in North Carolina are not registered to vote due to various barriers and circumstances. This prompts ACORN-like groups to hold registration drives that can generate sloppy and downright phony voter registrations.
That's the second problem. Voter lists become crowded with "Mickey Mouse," household pets and hundreds of names supposedly living in the same vacant lot. Many see an open invitation to election fraud. Experience shows that Mickey Mouse and other fictitious "voters" do not actually vote. The only fraud is against ACORN's donors. Save your tears for George Soros.
The problem with Voter ID and similar anti-fraud measures is that they can block access to the polls for legitimate voters while failing to address the real problem of bloated, unreliable voter lists. After all, elections are stolen through wholesale absentee fraud, not through multiple voting by individuals. And elections can be stolen by blocking access for legitimate citizens as well as by stuffing ballot boxes.
These problems will persist as long as we leave registration to the tender mercies of partisan officials and people with more money than sense. We can and should have both honest, reliable voter rolls and universal access for eligible citizens. Indeed, the framework for a new system is already in place.
Congress passed the National Voter Registration Act - the NVRA, or Motor Voter law - to eliminate these twin potential sources of corruption, bloated registration lists and barriers to access. It mandated an opportunity to register at each DMV, public assistance and disability services office. It also mandated removing the names of voters when they die, go to prison or move to another county.
Unfortunately (if not surprisingly), Congress left a loophole.
It assumed that every agency official would invite every eligible citizen to register to vote or update registration information, that necessary forms would be available, that the citizen would not think she was signing up for jury duty, that the agency wouldn't lose any application, that it would get to the registrar, that all name and address information would be re-entered accurately, that all agencies would tell each other when the voter died, went to prison or moved - in short, that no government office would ever make a mistake.
The underlying concept is good. Everyone visits one or more of these agencies when they move to another address or face other needs. The problem is too many moving parts, too many things to go wrong.
Some have called for a federal agency to take over voter registration. Do we really need yet another federal agency?
There is a better way to achieve universal and reliable voter registration, a way that involves no new machinery and actually saves time and money. Automatically register qualified citizen customers who use the DMV or a public assistance agency. Register all eligible customers automatically with a click on the computer, and update their address and other information automatically to create a new reliable list.
Automatic registration ensures that voter lists are trustworthy. Motor Voter agencies already make certain that applicants are who they claim to be, and they already screen those who are ineligible to vote for any reason. They don't give driver's licenses or public assistance checks to just anyone. They update address and eligibility information regularly.Automatic registration can promptly replace the outdated, fraud-prone voter rolls with voter lists are both trustworthy and complete. And integrating registration in a single electronic process eliminates the waste and duplication of an amateur, paper-based system. It actually saves money.
North Carolina can simultaneously register all eligible citizens to vote under secure conditions and make registration problems a thing of the past. With everyone registered, ACORN's heirs would have nothing to do. It is a classic win-win opportunity.
The alternative is more troubled registration drives, more legitimate citizens denied their right to vote and more distraction, division and demagoguery. North Carolina can solve two persistent problems and save money in the process. It is an easy choice. And at bottom, it is a character test.

description.hltext_display: Schweizer Banken wollen Steuerstreit mit Deutschland schnell abschließen
中方要求韩方严惩撞船肇事者
description.content:
来源：中新社┊980字节┊阅读：45次┊2010-12-22
中国外交部发言人姜瑜21日在例行记者会上表示，中国渔船与韩国海警执法艇发生冲撞与当前半岛局势没有直接关系，中方对这一事件表示严重关切，已向韩方提出严正交涉，目前搜救工作仍在进行中。
有记者提问，据报道，一艘中国渔船与韩国海警执法艇发生冲撞。请介绍情况。中方是否担心该事件给当前半岛局势增添复杂因素？
“首先我要指出，你提到的事件与当前半岛局势没有直接关系。”姜瑜说。
她表示，中方对这一事件表示严重关切，已向韩方提出严正交涉，要求韩方全力搜救我失踪船员，严惩肇事者，赔偿中方人员和财产损失，并采取切实措施杜绝类似事件再次发生。
“中方有关部门高度重视对遇险船员的搜救和善后工作。事发后，有关部门立即组织附近渔船和专业救助船赶往搜救，韩方也出动直升机和救助船前往现场搜救。据了解，目前搜救工作仍在进行中。”姜瑜表示。
她指出，我们认为，不管在什么海域，海警冲撞渔船、造成人员伤亡都是不应该发生的事情。事件发生在中韩渔业暂定措施水域，根据《中韩渔业协定》，两国渔船均可进入该水域作业，两国执法部门分别管理各自渔船，相互通报对方国家渔船违法行为，但无权登临对方国家渔船执法。
（中华传媒网）
